author: {'steamid': '76561198029602249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1240, 'last_played': 1574505721}
review:
All in all a really good game, impressive visuals and atmosphere, fun gameplay and good story.
A little confusing sometimes, but that doesn`t really hinder the experience, cause you always want to know what comes next and if you take your time looking around you`ll eventually find a way.
The level design is very impressive (verticality, shortcuts), they did a fantastic job here.
There are a few flaws like no lip movement for the npcs, or mandatory shelter at nighttime.
My Rating: 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198074749014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1575577330}
review:
Great game
I really had fun playing it.
It is a different type of  survival game. Here there is no building shelter you just have to keep pressing forward. I like it that way.
A lot to explore and a lot to learn about the island and it's people. There is generally a great mixture of surviving, story telling, climbing and fighting with few exception like a certain part where there is just climbing up to the top but since in terms of story it makes sense I say it's acceptable.
Some bugs still exist like getting stuck in a rock when trying to go where developers did not intend to let player go even though from player's perspective it should be accessible. Also, some more optimization would be nice but that can be fixed through future updates.
All in all a great game I enjoy playing and it definitely has my recommendation.

review: zengin bir ailenin kızısınız. zengin arkadaşlarınız ile adaya düşüyor, bir kuyuda kendinize geliyorsunuz. göreviniz ne olduğunu anlamak, arkadaşlarınızı bulmak ve adadan kaçmak. adada iki farklı insan türü var. spoiler vermemek gerekirse, bunlar " iyi ve kötü" insanlar.  güzel bir hayatta kalma temalı oyun fakat daha çok yolu var. buglar ve oyun mekaniği biraz değişmesi gerek. eğlenceli güzel bir oyun, indirimdeyken kaçırmayın tavsiye ederim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172079321', 'num_games_owned': 656, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 932, 'last_played': 1573872641}
review:
Como varios dicen, uno de mis descubrimientos del año. 
Al principio lo compré pensando que era un juego survival estilo rust, scum, etc. Pero al jugarlo y ver su historia y jugabilidad me di cuenta que fueron los putos 13 usd mejores gastados (si, el juego cuesta eso y es una locura). Lo desarrolló IndieGala, una empresa que muchas veces regala videojuegos y tiene buenas ofertas, pero esta vez se pasaron de la raya para bien con el precio.
El juego es un survival con zombies, animales salvajes, enemigos humanos,  armas muy variadas, una muy buena historia, parkour (el parkour hermano, el parkour es increible en este juego), acertijos, recolección de materiales mediante cacería o rastrillaje, recolección de pistas y notas,  y una ambientación muy buena. 
El juego no trata simplemente de sobrevivir, sino que, toda la supervivencia debe compensar a las misiones de la historia para lograr el objetivo del juego (Se preguntán cual es dicho objetivo, pero sería un spoiler y le sacaría la gracia al juego.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198175974851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1812, 'last_played': 1573502753}
review:
Nice exploration game that does not hold your hand, doing sidequests and progressing in the story backgrounds feels rewarding, especially since there are multiple endings. Also some tasks and ways to locations have different possible approaches (even goes as far as being able to on purpose not do what the quest log says) which is nice. And on a sidenote, the music is awesome! Without rushing, it took me 30 hours to 100% this game.

Downsides for me were: Lips are not moving when someone is talking (makes some scenes a bit "ridiculous" and not very immersive) // Combat & AI can be a bit clunky // Sometimes it's not clear if you e.g. missed certain items while exploring that you need to progress or if you will find them way later at a totally different place. Since there is fast travel to get back to old spots a bit faster this was not as bad though, you should be willing to explore and walk / parcour a lot though since this is essential here, while focus on combat is not as much if you are looking for that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134221199', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 1183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1183, 'last_played': 1573310803}
review:
[h1]I have played and finished the game with couple endings. Here is what I want to say about this game very shortly:  [/h1]

Story is bullshit. Really, it is so bad and empty. An island that can never be reached (apperantly not) and a whole forgotten corrupted socialism on that island? And this "secret" community is created by Turkey?! The very country that can't find it's own butt with both hands in broad daylight. So damn nonsense.

Anyway, I bought it to play some survival game, instead it turned out to be heavy parkour game. I'd play Dying Light if I were you if you love parkour games, not this poorly written game.

Even with sale, just avoid it, go watch some gameplays and soothe your curiosity. Because if you buy it, you'll want to complete it and it will cost you ~18 to ~20 hours. And it is boring! You'll only play just to explore stuff but really, there is not much to discover. Same stuff everywhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032184657', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1637522615}
review:
Game is not combat focused, so don't buy it for that. It's based around exploring interesting and sometimes spooky locations, and parkour and jumping puzzles. It's not really a survival crafting game, think of it as Far Cry 3 Lite. You've been kidnapped and sent to an island, find your friends and escape. The crafting is there for making healing items and makeshift weapons but not much else. This game definitely scratched my exploration itch and crawling around abandoned Dark Souls towers is fun.

That being said, the game has a lot of bugs with animal spawning, some wonky parkour stuff, and the optimization isn't great, but I'm still enjoying just exploring the island.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113426196', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2580, 'last_played': 1572989845}
review:
Отличная игра!Затягивает!
Чумной паркур,разнообразие игровых механик и игрового процесса,нелинейность, возможность попадать в одно и то-же место разными путями в зависимости от наличия игровых предметов и головного мозга.
Лара Крофт нервно курит антисоветский бамбук в стороне.
Из недостатков:
Некоторые задания не отображаются на карте.
Небольшой перебор с паркуром на мой взгляд и недостаточная оптимизация.
Спасибо!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979091641', 'num_games_owned': 948, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1291, 'last_played': 1572229014}
review: Die Young is a wonderful adventure game which looks and plays similar to Far Cry 3. It has light crafting elements, light combat mechanics, and a heavy emphasis on exploration and parkour. While it does feature combat, Die Young is more of a story-driven adventure than an action-focused shooter that was Far Cry 3. If you take your time, explore as much as possible, and try and complete all in-game quests, you can expect to spend anywhere between 12-20 hours on Die Young's unsettling island world.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095006938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1545, 'last_played': 1572984271}
review:
Jeu trés sympa, c'est assez immersif. Il y à quelques bug mais aucun n'entrave la progression. La rejouabilité est moindre mais heureusement on peux faire toutes les fins en une run tant qu'on oublie pas de sauvegarder sur un slot différend.

Bon par-contre l'IA est au fraise ce qui rend les combats en milieu de game trés facile/ridicule tend on peux enchainé les headshot a l'arbalète en etant caché dans les hautes herbes. pour les combats au corps a corps le parti pris est clairement de donné l'avantage au enemies ce qui est trés bon pour l'imersion survival/horreur surtout en début de game.

En 25h je l'ai finit avec tous les succés donc cotés durée de vie cela peux semblé court mais au vue du petit prix et du sénar qui est a la fois original prenant et nous donne envie d'explorer cette ile malgrés les dangers c'est honnête.

Bref un bon petit jeu Rape and revenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198290188920', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 2113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1846, 'last_played': 1572977136}
review:
Ya cuando salió como Alpha a principios de 2017 mostró unos gráficos excelentes y apuntaba maneras, ofreciendo algo que me fascina: terror de día. Siendo mi género favorito, es un incordio que en la mayoría de títulos sean tan oscuros que a veces ni siquiera veas nada, aun subiendo el brillo a tope.

En el aspecto survival es bastante light, aunque tienes que comer y beber no cuesta hacerlo. Es un poco como The Forest en el sentido de que tiene su historia, quizás en este está más presente que en el otro. Es una historia realmente buena. El mapa es bastante grande pero tiene un sistema de puntos de viaje rápido que facilitan mucho las cosas, sobre todo porque hay lugares de difícil acceso. 

Tiene mucho de parkour y escalada, muy bien implementado, es uno de sus fuertes, si tienes vértigo como yo, resulta bastante impresionante. También tiene sigilo y combate. Puedes craftear herramientas, armas y medicinas.

Un comentario reciente pone que no se puede terminar el juego. El juego ya está completo y no le he encontrado ningún bug, va perfecto, de hecho, ya me he pasado los 3 finales distintos que tiene. Los logros son relativamente fácil de conseguir todos, no hay ninguno de esos imposibles o de esos puñeteros tipo recoger todos los documentos.

En resumen, una maravilla de juego, largo, interesante, completo, 100% recomendable, está entre lo mejorcito del año, sin duda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064791137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1630284291}
review:
I've played about 4hrs and I'm loving it! The thing that stands out the most to me is the exploration. Sometimes it feels like an open world Tomb Raider when you're climbing and jumping off ledges in puzzle-like rooms. I like the slow paced gameplay. It can be a chill game with the right amount of danger and suspense. I don't like games that have danger at every corner like if it's an amusement park. There's enough breathing room for you to enjoy the idyllic atmosphere of the Mediterranean island. 

The only minor issue I have is the performance. It can stutter a bit when moving around but not to a point that it will kill your enjoyment of the game. And the protagonist's voice is way too loud. No matter how low I move the voice slider, nothing happens. So if you're using earphones, prepare for that! ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198005341943', 'num_games_owned': 1554, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1573298919}
review:
Es una mezcla de survival, sigilo y horror. Mientras vas descubriendo una historia te tienes que preocupar por sobrevivir en un mapa lleno de peligros y siniestros personajes y algunos animales a los que parece molestarles especialmente que respires.
Tiene partes donde tendras que ir saltando y colgandote literalmente para llegar a partes complicadas con el aliciente de que le dan un enfoque realista respecto al tiempo que puedes estar colgado... es decir, que los brazos se cansan y agotas la energia si te pasas colgado mas tiempo del debido, algo que hara que te caigas sin mas.
Han integrado "Die Young prologue" que es un una demo del juego con mecanicas similares pero diferente historia. Realmente es un minijuego y hace que te adaptes a sus mecanicas rapidamente.
Recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006217347', 'num_games_owned': 1157, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1573053168}
review:
This is a very clunky open world game with survival elements.

+ Big areas to explore.
+ Visuals are okay.

- Obscure objectives.
- Really bad story.
- Terrible combat.
- Very basic stealth.
- This game makes exploration a chore.
- Terrible map.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110634737', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 2483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2483, 'last_played': 1571555154}
review:
적절한 난이도와 나름 흥미진진한 스토리라인 다만 전투 레벨링이 기복이 심한편으로 일반몹은 너무 쉽고 보스몹은 너무 안죽는다는 느낌이다. 

시원시원한 파쿠르 액션이 볼만함 다만 고소공포증 있는 사람은 플레이 하면서 오금이 저릴만한 순간들이 좀 있음

네비게이션이 좀만 더 편리했으면 좋았지 않았을까 하는 생각도 들지만 탈출이 목적인 게임이므로 헤메는게 게임 본래의 취지인거 같아서 단점이라고 하기엔 애매하다.

review: Хорошая игра. Скалолазания действительно много, но,  к релизу, разработчики сделали его адекватным. Немного спорный сюжет про [spoiler] сектантов-скалолазов [/spoiler], но на фоне приятной картинки, и интересного геймплея, на нем можно сильно не заморачиваться. Мне игру хотелось пройти до конца, и посмотреть все концовки. К покупке рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994290395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1624, 'last_played': 1572791690}
review:
Just finished the game.  It took me about 27 hours, and I did not do everything, but it also took me a while to figure out things, so it probably take other people less time.  Take the parkour elements from Assassins's Creed, the crafting style from Far Cry, and the exploration & survival elements of Subnautica and mix them together (no base building though.)

This is not a "hold your hands" type of game.  You immediately get thrown into the world, with minimal guidance and off you go.  This is not a shooter game, this is a stealth and avoidance game.  

So if you like an exploration game, with health, hydration and weapon durability, this is for you.  If you like some action, but not 100% intense action, this is for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198405422695', 'num_games_owned': 249, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1632, 'last_played': 1662820998}
review: Why are you doing all of this ? You think it's freedom you're going back to ? That you're .. leaving captivity ? The world out there is a burning furnace, Daphne , and you're digging your own grave every single day. Did you fight this hard , only to live in a world like that ? Do you really want to be an accomplice of it ?  Maybe you think you're innocent . That your... conscience is clean . But it's not . It never was . You're guilty when you drive your car to the supermarket around the corner . When you eat a hamburger in your favourite fast food joint . When you buy designer clothes at the mall . You're guilty when you enjoy the cool breeze coming from your AC , or when you take a long hot shower . The world out there is rotten , Daphne . Youll never be as free as you were here . This place may be wiped out soon ... but one day ... one day you'll wake up in the middle of the night thinking : Was that right thing to do ? Am I reaaly free now ? You'll know the answer when the time comes .  Farewell , Daphne.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221611416', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1659555272}
review:
I've had this game for AGES, and always liked the idea of it more than I liked the game itself;  until recently that was, the last update has done it wonders in my opinion. I'll be keeping my eye on this one more regularly from now on!

I completed this game on the 12th of November (as I write this its the 1st of December) and I'm itching to start the game again. Partly this is because I'm only 7 achievements off a full-house, but its also because I've begun to understand just how much I loved that island!

Die Young is Far Cry by way of Friday the 13th, two things I like very, very much!

author: {'steamid': '76561197988582370', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1471, 'last_played': 1572729298}
review:
В целом игра понравилась. 
Первая половина игры очень хороша: есть элементы выживания, много скалолазания, хорошая оптимизация, в целом эта часть игры лучше проработана. 
Вторая половина такое впечатление, что делалась впопыхах: оптимизация явно хуже, появились баги, главная героиня превратилась в Рембо (разработчики даже сами подкалывают игроков, давая в распоряжение гг нож "в стиле Рембо", никакого выживания больше нет, паркура/скалолазания больше нет. 
Концовок 3 (2 хорошие и одна плохая), их можно оценить как "удовлетворительно", история раскрыта хорошо, сюжет на твердую 4.
Моя субъективная оценка: 3 + из 5, а если вспомнить, что это инди-игра, то твердая 4, а может даже и с "+"! Я игру рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000298969', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1572729155}
review:
MINOR SPOILERS (very minor) in this review

So I've played for roughly 5 hours and the story is sooooo bad and un-immersive I just couldn't go on.
I think the worst part was when I came through a kind of stone fort checkpoint...

So far I've been kidnapped. Thrown into a deep well. Chased by dogs. Hunted by insane people and forced to fight for my life. I found some of my friends brutally murdered! And when I get past this checkpoint-thingy I finally meet some non-hostile NPC's which I cannot interact with and they don't even seem to notice my existence.
WHAT?

How about crying for help? Asking wtf is going on? Demanding answers?
No. Instead you find some old horny man, give him some snarky comment and then agree to go look for a fu**** document hidden beneath some stone he doesn't remember where.

....really?

Also, the character reacts very random to scary encounters. They obviously tried to put some humor into the game but it's just... odd.

Example:
You find a hut, filled with blood on the walls and floor and she says "wow someone sneezed on her period".
 **badum tss - oh so witty** 
But when you find a room filled with blood in another area (later in the progress) she goes "OMG what the FU** happened here?"

Aside from the story;

Gameplay is... meh. The platforming is pretty easy, but you can't move around as freely as you might think. Every area has clear path you're supposed to take. 

The enemy AI is really stupid, making it trivial when you encounter them.
Honestly you can just keep running. Nothing can really stop you anyway.
Chased? Jump up on a platform. Or keep running. They will follow, and are quick (at least some of them), but they give up faster than your stamina drains.

Graphic is pretty nice though! So there's that..

The music plays totally random and doesn't deliver the right feeling at the right moment.
You run around the island and suddenly this super mysterious and evil soundtrack plays... making you think you found something...or someone found you!
But no. Just another randomly started soundtrack.

So glad I got this on a good sale... utter waste of time and cash.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024113556', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1752, 'last_played': 1572750958}
review: Great game if you're into exploration and finding hidden secrets. The story is fine and kept me engaged, I wanted to find out what happened at the end. Combat is wonky at best, once you get a decent melee weapon or the crossbow just dodge and kite and you'll never die.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970079390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1616517144}
review: Die Young's open-world turkish island has cleverly connected areas, the story's pleasantly mysterious and scary. Getting around the harsh terrain is dangerous - you will fall a lot from spectacular heights. A challenging game that borrows ideas from good survival adventure games. The main complaint is that you don't get much interaction with NPCs apart from conversations, that feels lackluster. Coop would have made the game a masterpiece. 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067214386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 8890, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7271, 'last_played': 1574473697}
review: Wow! This is one of the most value for dollars game I have played! The parkour is great and smooth, the engine rendering is awesome, the game is just fun and feels like a well built modern game! I typically don't review or rave over games, but this has add a new standard of game play that I've been missing - I am just wonder when some AAA games I like developers will add this kind of action/parkour to theirs. Outerworlds just came out and I am like, "this would have been awesome in it." Just when I think it's going to end, like the ol' "Indie game shortness" syndrome, it just keeps going - in a great way! I am eager for part two! Keep it coming guys!

author: {'steamid': '76561197993222028', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1170, 'last_played': 1572556633}
review: A well-made mix of Far Cry and Dishonored, but with even more survival aspects. Enjoyable story, although very poorly voice acted and not entirely optimized to its full potential (no lip syncing, simple NPC interactions). But definitely worth playing through, I had a very enjoyable time where I was rather hooked over the course of a few days. Rather short game too, as I did everything in 2-3 days 100 % completed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198263130906', 'num_games_owned': 1429, 'num_reviews': 1191, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1572440200}
review:
《Die Young》是一款第一人称生存动探索作游戏，讲述女主与伙伴们一同在荒岛探险，却不慎迷失，就此开始了生存下去，并探索岛屿的秘密的历程。游戏的画面水准上乘，地图庞大，动作元素充足，并带有物品合成等内容，在自由探索中逐步发掘到主线内容的游戏方式也充满魅力。然而游戏的新手引导并不充足，且目前仍无中文，有待观望。

[h1]画面表现[/h1]

虽然本作较为冷门，但但就画面表现而言没有明显逊于大作。游戏建模精致，山峦、丛林、草地、灌木、废墟等场景一应俱全，且基本没有纸片草纸片树叶等敷衍了事的现象。充足的场景数量，配合庞大的地图，使得游玩过程中不会有明显的场景重复感。此外不管是人物还是动物，也都有着不错的画面表现，动物毛发感很足，质感上佳。只是默认设定中的方块影子着实不怎么样。
优秀的画面质量能够带来极佳的第一印象，刚进入游戏，在枯井中醒来，头上是投下的阳光，攀上石壁，石块质感很强，配合绿叶、藤曼等细节，瞬间一股孤岛探险的感觉就来了。

[h1]动作玩法[/h1]

游戏的动作方面内容比较足，基础的跑跳，额外的隐蔽、滑铲、攀爬，基本确认是个跑酷游戏了。其实从刚进游戏时候就完全看得出来，女主人猿一样在石头上左右跳跃蹦出枯井，嗯，不一般。另外攻击方面包含轻重攻击和投掷，本质攻击方式不算充足，但相对多样的武器算是一定程度补全了这一方面的不足。初始玩家的武器就只有地上捡起的木棍，几分钟后便可收集材料制成小刀。除了制作外，玩家也可以选择干掉人类敌人，夺取其武器，迅速武装自身。
说到底女主毕竟是个普通人，战斗力比较有限。游戏存在体力条的限制，消耗完便需要原地喘气，对于难打的敌人正面刚赢的可能性较低，但可以通过潜行暗杀的方式解决，也可以通过跑路、躲藏等方式避战。

[h1]剧情探索[/h1]

游戏起手一无所有，由于存在食物和饮水的需求，大前期当成生存游戏也未尝不可，玩家需要一边跟着模糊的任务引导去探索、收集、完成制定目标，另一方面要保证自己活下来。而在探索过程中，玩家可以通过拾取到的一些纸片等，逐渐了解整个剧情的设定和部分内容，并在看似漫无目的的探索中渐渐挖掘关于岛屿的真相，这种剧情探索模式吸引力很强，但是，迄今为止承诺的官中还未兑现，对于剧情玩家，英文的观感并不好。

[h1]总结[/h1]

虽然冷门，但颇具潜力的一款包括探索、动作、生存等要素在内的作品，对于动作冒险玩家而言是个值得一试的选择，但是仍推荐等到官中实装。

以上测评仅供参考，只代表个人意见

[code]欢迎参观我的： [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33626600]奸商评测[/url]
喜欢这篇评论，可顺手点个赞，让更多人方便看到。[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561197997428170', 'num_games_owned': 513, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1228, 'last_played': 1655212239}
review:
Quirky, pretty, B-movie horror, parkour, exploration game.  There's even a look over your shoulders button while you're running!

I don't even mind when it crashes because the main menu music is so lit... not to mention the cerebral-af synthwave that blindsides you every once in awhile when you stumble into a new area.  10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198421035761', 'num_games_owned': 1807, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1571753111}
review:
[quote]
[h1][spoiler]真·跑酷游戏[/spoiler][/h1]

[h1]Die young[/h1]
本作是由IndieGala制作并发行的一款第一人称动作冒险游戏，玩家将扮演一名迷失荒岛的年轻女孩，开始一场惊险刺激的逃亡与探索之旅。游戏的主要玩法就是跑酷，庞大的岛屿地图是天然的跑酷场所，游戏既满足玩家了的探索欲，在自由探索的基础上夹杂上主线剧情，配合不错的游戏场景以及音乐，整体游戏体验不错。但游戏较为可惜的一点就是没有官中，好在文本难度不算太高，喜欢此类游戏的玩家不妨一试。

[h1]👉前言👈[/h1]
陌生的岛屿，年轻人追求刺激的圣地，美丽的风景中暗含无处不在的杀机；
游戏剧情带有浓浓的阴谋论的感觉，逃亡、探险的题材与荒岛天然的游戏背景相得益彰，可以说背景与题材选取的都非常恰当，具有现实讽刺意味。一群喜欢追求刺激的年轻人，一个可以畅游的天然岛屿，一个本应美好的假期，但就在一瞬间，一场灾难降临，仿佛是从天而降的惩罚，究竟是命中注定的不幸还是巧合？

因为女主+荒岛求生+探索真相的设定，导致我在游玩时甚至有一种游玩低配古墓丽影的感受，本作虽说不能说是在这种题材的游戏中做到了极致，但仍然配得上出色这一称号。目前来说，游戏较为可惜的一点就是没有官中，但游戏总体文本量不算太大，也给了玩家足够的时间去阅读理解剧情的含义，阅读难度不高。并且游戏开发者正在进行官中的译制，应该几周之后就可以正式上线。

[h1]👉游戏体验👈[/h1]

[b]1️⃣真·跑酷游戏[/b]
游戏为玩家提供了一个不小的海岛地图以及众多建筑供玩家探索，而体力值的设定导致玩家不能无限制地在开阔的世界中奔跑，血量值以及状态栏也为主角的求生之路增添了几分挑战性。在游戏的初始，主角一无所有，只能漫无目的地从地图游荡，虽说游戏有一定的指引，但是并没有特别的明确，要是不稍加注意的话可能会卡关，钥匙的位置也并不是十分明显（有时候还会有任务栏不刷新的bug，我还经历过一次不刷钥匙的bug）游戏的操作上手极快，玩家甚至在主角从井底爬上来的过程中就可以掌握游戏的主要操作方式——跑、跳，跑酷的流程可谓充满了整个游戏。场景之中的建筑上基本都有十分明显的可以攀爬的位置，在设计上也十分巧妙，只要按照设计的路径来就不会受到任何跌落伤害，虽说部分位置需要一定的技巧，但总体来说难度不高。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895915457
[b]2️⃣不难的生存部分[/b]
虽说游戏的主线就是跑酷与探索，但游戏的生存属性也是不容忽略的。在岛屿上，有不少游荡的敌对生物，既有人类也有不少动物。为了防卫敌人，玩家可以通过收集材料制作武器或是就地捡上一根木棍，但游戏中一个十分刺激而又便捷的获取武器方法，就是锤爆游荡的敌人的狗头然后抢走他的武器。在面对一些血量不高，攻击力也不高的敌人时，玩家完全可以选择正面对刚，但轮到一些boss级别的敌人时，还是乖乖潜行吧。玩家可以通过观察敌人头上的警觉标记来判断自己是否被发现。通常来说，面对人类敌人时，只要跑的够快就不必担心被追上的问题，但面对像野狗一样速度快并且难以拉开距离的敌人时就需要依靠地形来进行躲藏。
不同于一些沙盒类型的生存游戏，本作出现了生化危机玩家深恶痛绝的格子危机，初期极少的储存格需要后期满满获得物品进行扩大。一些基础资源的携带数量也有一定上限，玩家也可以在制作界面使用这些物品制作武器或是药品。游戏在这一方面的表现就显得中规中矩，没有什么亮点。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1896008478
[b]3️⃣音画表现[/b]
游戏的画面表现还不错，美丽的海岛与阴森的场景以及丑陋的敌人形成鲜明的对比，建筑的细节以及敌人建模做的也是较十分细腻，光影变换以及色彩渲染都具有游戏的特色，抛开恶心的大老鼠以及血腥场面来说，还是十分养眼的。（旅游模拟器XD）此外，游戏的bgm以及音效可以说是十分出色，将主角的处境展现的淋漓尽致，给玩家的代入感十分强烈，体验极佳。
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895915440
[h1] ❤️优点❤️[/h1]

👍 丰富的游戏内容

👍 刺激有趣的跑酷流程

👍 不错的音画表现

[h1]💔缺点💔[/h1]

👎 无官方中文（不久会出）

👎 战斗操作手感一般

author: {'steamid': '76561198052702797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1944, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 697, 'last_played': 1657666693}
review:
En français: Même si je pense que ce jeu a un gros potentiel et une histoire plutôt intéressante (je préfère généralement les jeux vidéo avec un scénario spécifique), il a néanmoins besoin d'être sérieusement optimisé. Je joue à ce jeu sur un ordinateur avec un processeur de niveau I7 (autant dire que la puissance n'est pas négligeable) et malgré ça, ça lague énormément, à tel point que ça en devient franchement agaçant et que ça gâche le plaisir et je ne comprends pas comment il est possible que ce jeu lague autant avec l'ordinateur que je possède. De plus, le jeu des acteurs de voix manque d'homogénéité: le personnage principal a un jeu plus que correct mais certains des PNJ comme le fermier qui se trouve dans l'Oliveraie ou l'ermite qui vit dans les Fourrés du Chêne vert ont un jeu très pauvre en qualité; on dirait qu'ils lisent leurs répliques au lieu de les dire.

Je lui laisse donc une note de 6,5/10 et j'encourage les développeurs à l'améliorer car je pense sincèrement que ce jeu peut être bon avec une meilleure optimisation.

Merci.

- 

In English: Whilst I think this game has a lot of potential and an interesting storyline (I generally prefer video games that have a specific scenario), it seriously needs to be optimized. I'm running the game on a computer with an I7 core processor (so it's quite powerful) and yet the frame rate drops so often, to the point where it just feels absolutely irritating and it ruins the pleasure of playing the game, and I absolutely don't understand how this is even possible considering the computer I'm running it on. Also, the voice acting is kind of unequal: the main character sounds totally alright but some NPCs like the Olive Grove farmer or the Holm Oak Thicket hermit sound just dull and boring, it feels like they're reading their lines and not telling them.

I'm leaving it a 6,5/10 and can only encourage the devs to improve its quality because I genuinely think that this game can be a really good game with a little bit of optimisation. 

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962054695', 'num_games_owned': 2521, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 743, 'last_played': 1572940102}
review:
Were you to mix Mirror's Edge with a survival game and hand it off to a AA studio, you'd get something that looks a bit like this.  Overall I found this game oddly compelling, with the main star likely being the baseline feel of movement.  Exploring the world is pretty darn satisfying given the navigation system and the lack of clear direction, and throughout the game you can find various meaningful upgrades that would easily be missable.

There's some misses here for sure - the tone is reasonably inconsistent across the audio and story, and the plot is very much a start and stop affair, but I think it's still a game worth checking out if you are a fan of single player survival games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198852034321', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1572341328}
review:
很难想象为什么主角在悬崖峭壁之间如履平地，面对敌人却挥动几下小刀就没气了。可能是主角刚来岛上需要一个适应的过程。
战斗系统出乎意料的差。玩的一周目最高难度，闪避偶尔还有CD，偶尔没法触发闪避，敌人的招式繁杂多变，而我方只有扔武器和轻攻击。重攻击需要极长的蓄力时间，而且很容易被打断。1v1还没问题。但1v2就会让游戏难度大大增加。什么你说一个普通人打俩本来就难？女主可是飞檐走壁的人猿啊……不存在这个问题的。还有就是冲刺，我寻思普通人起步也没那种陷入泥潭拔不出腿的感觉。还有敌我双方高低差有将近20m，但敌人依旧可以打到我。玩了三个小时，其中一个半小时都在爬墙，仿佛制作组在对我说：“爬”。狗狗离地扑人后主角闪避，狗狗会追踪过来这些事就不提了。

再说说AI，主角潜行时对坐着的地方扔一把刀，敌人只会站起来原地僵住，过四五秒才会后知后觉地向飞到飞来的方向跑来。可能敌人有什么怪病，感受不到痛觉。

author: {'steamid': '76561198008768016', 'num_games_owned': 884, 'num_reviews': 196, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1572184491}
review:
[i]Имея в своем распоряжении только чутье и инстинкты, Лара должна выйти за пределы человеческой выносливости, раскрыть темные тайны забытого острова, на который ее забросила судьба, и сразиться за свое право вырваться из мертвой хватки этого места и сбежать отсюда.[/i]

Wait a minute... Я не понял, причем тут описание из Tomb Raider и как оно вообще сюда попало???
... Ладно, тут где то было нормальное описание... Ага, нашел!

[i]Игра посвящена выживанию на обитаемом острове: игровой персонаж, попавший на остров в результате авиакатастрофы, должен находить себе пищу и кров, а также обороняться от пугающих туземцев-каннибалов[/i]

Хммм... Что то здесь не так. Наверно я снова ошибся, пойду поищу еще, а то это описание смахивает на The Forest.

[i]Боевик от первого лица с элементами выживания, действие которого разворачиваются в постапокалиптическом мире, кишащем кровожадными зомби[/i]

Ну а описание Dying Light тут что забыло? Это из-за паркура? 
... Госпади, достало уже все. Давайте просто петь, ладненько? Слова знаем? Подпевайте: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YwVr5XtKj6Y [i]We're here and we're alone
We're crawling in the dark
We reach out…[/i]
Все, дальше давайте сами, а я пойду на ютубчик, видосы смотреть. Чао!

[i]…Один большой дикий остров. А с опасностями на каждом шагу будет справляться Кристофер Минц-Пласс....[/i]

ДА БЛ#%&!

author: {'steamid': '76561198208084579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2393, 'last_played': 1575202618}
review: Первый раз когда запустил на старом компе оттолкнули корявость и лаги, но после покупки норм железа 2я попытка зашла, даже очень зашла. Из минусов для меня лично это неудобство внутреигрового меню. Из плюсов конечно СЮЖЕТ! Атмосфера, карта, природа, пейзажи, присутствует режим стелс, паркур по началу отталкивал но после стал наоборот привлекать. Игра приковывала к креслу днями! Поиграв пару дней во время сна проглючивало что я срываюсь со скалы после прохождения высокой башни :) спать не мог просыпался каждые полчаса :) Сюжет, атмосфера и сам остров завораживают! Любителям шмалять, шмалять из больших пушек по всем подряд эта игра вряд ли понравится, как в прочем и детям эта игра полезной точно не будет. Если Вы хотите на пару вечеров или больше окунуться в мир красот, загадок с тяжелыми условиями проживания и хорошо провести время игра точно запомнится на долго. Очень советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022735366', 'num_games_owned': 590, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1660591817}
review: Заметил еще в раннем доступе, но тогда посчитал, что это очередная выживалка и прошел мимо. Сейчас увидел релиз и игра просто затянула с первых минут. Здесь больше триллер с элементами выживания, чем очередной выживастик. Хорошая графика и затягивающий геймплей( не знаю почему, просто невозможно оторваться), плюс ко всему еще и сюжет интересный. Правда со всех сторон прет бюджетность, но получить удовольствие от игры не мешает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089378737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 3524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1488, 'last_played': 1663660703}
review:
Играл в неё ещё с раннего доступа с самой сырой версии следил как её клепали и вот доколупали . Неплохая паркуро-выживалка неплохой сюжет , допилили и предисторию . Есть в игре очень цепляющая музыка но она появляется на каких то странных местах вроде ни разу не сюжетных вообщем как с заданного места уходишь метров на 5 она прекращается . К ознакомлению подана полностью приобретать или нет решайте.
P.S. Решил дописать обзор так как прошёл игру на все концовки и получил массу удовольствия от сюжета  и геймплея игра очень зацепила. Давно я не переживал из-за персонажа . Игра действительно стоющая  разработчики молодцы но а я пойду пожалуй , всем мира.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020270848', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 2791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2775, 'last_played': 1574904521}
review:
I hate walking simulators where you aimlessly wander through corridors and boring landscapes under the moniker of "exploration". I hate jumping puzzles where you have to perform pixel perfect jumps on moving platforms. I hate adventure games where you have to solve contrived puzzles in order to open a door. I hate survival games where you grind for hours to finally craft a new nifty tool that breaks shortly after.

Die Young has exploration, jumping puzzles, adventure elements and survival mechanics. And somehow mixes them together in a surprisingly engaging and fun way.

You wake up as Daphne, a sporty party girl on a holiday trip gone wrong. With a dry throat and no clue what going on you start to explore the island and find your friends.

The best part of Die Young is the exploration and the movement system. The running and jumping almost reminded me of the (sadly ill-fated) mobility shooter Dirty Bomb (sans wall jumping). The climbing mechanics are well down and put you in a nice flow. Some parts are challenging and you might fall from time to time, but nothing is infuriating.

The Mediterranean island and the sunny weather are welcome change to all the games on the market that aim at being dark and gritty and just end up being a boring mesh of brown and gray. If you enjoyed the scenery of Far Cry 1 or 3, you should like this too.

The game doesn’t hold your hand. So instead of following yellow markers on your screen you typically find some notes with a rough hint where to go next. Also it’s quite common for parts of a puzzle to be found at locations far from each other. In other games I often got angry about this. In Die Young it’s not an issue because there is always something else to do. And often while you looking for something, you find something else that you need for another task you weren’t even aiming at. I found this open puzzle design really captivating and the second major reason for enjoying the game as much as I did.

While the plot is fairly traditional in its core (find out what’s going on, deal with the baddies, escape the island), the way the people on the island came to be as they are, what they believe in and how the bad guy actually has a point, makes it different to the stock Hollywood baddies. The speech during the helicopter flight was one the high points in this respect.

While in theory you can solve many situations by sneaking, especially during the later parts of the game I found the violent approach to be more economic. However you still have to pick your battles wisely. You never reach a point where you can just mow down everything, and that’s a good thing. 

The price is fair, you should get at least 10 hours of game play and more like 20 if you explore everything (which I recommend to do as there are plenty of optional but still interesting places).

Kudos to the developers for how the handled the game and communication during its early access period. Although some supporters got a bit riled during the final months of quality assurance, where naturally it was harder to tell something interesting.

The game was already pretty stable upon release. The few bugs that cropped up during the early days were quickly addressed by the developers and the game is very robust now.

As with every game there are a few things that did not work out as well as intended: You should own semi decent hardware to really enjoy the visuals. Close combat is pretty awful but luckily the AI is quite dumb, and can mostly be bested by kiting around while beating it with sticks or other tools. During resting, cut scenes might show that do not really add much to the characters. Some of the secondary voice actors are downright awful. Especially Daphne's father sounds like he’s on some really hard medication. Thankfully Daphne and the main baddies are performed pretty well. A few NPC’s actually talk to you – but without lip movement. When Daphne encounters mutilated corpses she is either shocked or cracks a joke, which felt inconsistent to me. At one point you have to fight a large dog in a very boring way. And the final boss fight is mostly about abusing the AI instead of being tactically creative.

However none of this effects the overall fun in any significant way. So if the basic mechanics and visuals of the game sound interesting to you, I can wholeheartedly recommend Die Young.

author: {'steamid': '76561198380896825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1308, 'last_played': 1657259708}
review: 1.0版本和序章都已经通关。主线的话最后是击败Bro.No.3然后坐直升机撤退的。支线任务并没有做完，所以。。。。。。。因为有一个任务是前往社区加入新的家庭，我没管，直接去决战了，所以我怀疑这游戏是不是多结局？doge 总体来说很不错，配乐，风景设计，都很棒，关键是这种自由探索的感觉。攀登和跑酷的路线设计也很不错，但是又能逐步把主线穿插在里面，pretty good job。缺点也有，优化不算太好，在区域间切换时会有卡帧的现象。不过瑕不掩瑜就是了。可以说是消逝的光芒的女性求生版，但是个人认为比消逝的光芒好玩点。推荐入手。19年绝对的黑马游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198030629896', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 1485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1572026526}
review: A great action adventure game by an indie developer. If you are familiar with Dying Light and enjoyed it you will feel right at home with this game. The parkour elements and combat are very similar to DL in a good way. Die Young offers a fairly large open map with quite a few optional side quests. Exploring the map is enjoyable and generally rewarding. Haven't come across any major technical issues and the developer is very active in fixing any errors that come along. Definitely recommended and one of the biggest positive surprises for me in 2019.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165592422', 'num_games_owned': 448, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1434, 'last_played': 1571067127}
review:
クリア済みです。

【言語】

日本語はありません。
多くの文書などを入手したり会話したりする事があるので、
英語が苦手な方はストーリーを理解するのは難しいと思いますが、
表示されるタスクの意味だけ理解できればゲームを進める分には問題ありません。

【サバイバル】

クラフト要素はありますが建築要素は無く、
水や食料は潤沢にあるのでサバイバル要素は薄いです。

【クエスト】

「仲間を探して島からの脱出を目指す」というメインクエストがあり、
それに付随する形でサイドクエストが発生して行きます。
オープンワールドなのでゲームが始まると世界に放り出されます。
どこから行くかは自由なのですが、大体の場合においてその場では解決できない事が多いです。
サブクエストの中にはメインクエストが進まないと手に入らない物が必要だったりするからです。

【クラフト】

レシピ制で作れるものが増えていきます。
木や皮などは豊富に手に入りますが、
布・瓶・鉄くず・紐など有限な素材もあるのでご利用は計画的に。
敵も一度倒すとリスポーンしません。

【オープンワールド】

エリアは大きく分けて３部に分けられるかと思います。
①スタートからゲートまで、②ゲートからハイタワーまで、③そしてその後のエリアです。
おそらく低評価の方はハイタワーまで(早期アクセス)のレビューかと思われます。
序盤こそ敵が少ない物の②～③にかけて多くなります。
戦闘メインのゲームではありませんので程よいくらいだと感じました。
先述したように同じ場所を往復する事になりますが、
ファストトラベルポイントが設けられているのでそれ程苦にならないと思います。

【クリア後の感想】

複雑な場所があったりタスクが分かりづらくて無駄にウロウロしたりする事もありましたが、
移動(パルクール)の操作感が良く最後まで飽きる事なく楽しむ事が出来ました。
クリアまで23時間程かかりました。
購入するとDIE YOUNG PROLOGUEも一緒にライブラリに追加されるのでお得です。
こちらは本編への導入的ストーリーで施設からの脱出のみが目的で２時間ほどでクリアしました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198146610092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1180, 'last_played': 1570918509}
review:
It's a nice game.
I enjoyed it.

The graphics are nice.
The island has alot of nice places.

The only thing I missed was a minimap.
I can understand that when you started the game you need to figure out where you are etc.
But when you get a map. I think they should have putted a minimap so the player can see where is. and which direction he should go.

To be honest I had to open Maps every 15 seconds, to be sure I was still running the right path.
So that could be very annoying.
At the second hand, on some quest. U could see a green dot on the map.
So you know where you should go.

But for alot of side quest they didn't do it.
They should have make a optional button where you can also do that for your side quest.

It's worth to play this game.
But I think they should add a minimap, and fix some bugs.
Sometimes when i'm running or climbing it's laggy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271966973', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2748, 'last_played': 1571492283}
review:
Très bon jeu. En facile on a plus de l'aventure que de la survie. Je recommande de faire toutes les quêtes annexes pour débloquer des outils, objets, armes, augmenter la durée de vie du jeu. Par exemple la quête "The Collector's Diary" débloque une énorme liste d'objets/outils. (faite la quête, vous comprendrez quand viendra la récompense)... 

Le jeu est en monde libre mais nécessite un certain ordre de choses par rapport à l'histoire et au scénario. Beaucoup de clés, astuces et trucs à découvrir. Je recommande de ne pas aller trop vite. (bien regarder partout). 

On peut y jouer sans vraiment connaître l'anglais cependant faudrait quand même apporter un support de la langue française car beaucoup d'énigmes sont écrites "documents qu'on récupère un peu partout dans le jeu". 
On peut facilement être bloqué si on ne regarde pas les textes récupérés. Bon y'a toujours le moyen de prendre le spoil sur youtube/groupesteam mais ça casse pas mal l'immersion. 

Globalement je n'ai pas rencontré de bugs dans le jeu sauf :
1-Un succès steam "Find your Friends" qui ne s'est pas débloqué.
2-Je fais la quête mais la quête reste dans le journal "Find Andre's Hideout".
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/786366868710886561/0790C98D2CE5236BA9A3DCB7EEC7D1D45AB575D8/
3-Le bug des toilettes avec des bloques mappé très étroit. Il est presque impossible aux joueurs de rentrer dans ce bâtiment à cause de collisions sur le personnage.
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/786366868710887451/E74FE7F2066D995C4AB2F6D64F7180B3569F9E3C/
4-Le bug de l'ascenseur avec un bouton qui le fait rentrer dans le sol, puis impossible de le faire réapparaître. :D
Vu de dessus, j'ai rien actionné.
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/786366868710889251/B2E0FB8D2D179A4F7BE0506132824F916BE6A22A/
Vu face à l'ascenseur, je n'ai pas encore actionné.
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/786366868710889804/6BAFD3002E44E7ACAC93F898DEF04C5269474C65/
Vu après l'avoir actionné. :D
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/786366868710893273/082997D5A283AEE0CEFD62389041A5B2B143EA68/

author: {'steamid': '76561198062206253', 'num_games_owned': 440, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 2802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1591, 'last_played': 1572370928}
review:
Großartiges Indie Spiel!

Ein IT-Girl, dass warum auch immer auf der Insel gelandet ist (stellt sich nach und nach raus) und der Plan diese wieder zu verlassen. Eine interessante Story wird nach und nach enthüllt und ist in sich schlüssig. 

Das Spiel macht Spaß und nervt manchmal zu gleich. So sind die Kletterpassagen manchmal etwas heftig. Häufiges Speichern ist hier also echt empfohlen, damit nicht alles noch mal erklettert werden muss. Gegnern geht man am besten so weit es geht aus dem Weg, denn zum Kämpfen ist unsere Protagonisten mit Sicherheit nicht geboren. Etwas craften, etwas Survival, etwas Parcour, irgendwie von allem etwas und gut. 

Eine Sache sollte man beachten: Geht den Hauptstrang durch. Einige Gegenstände erscheinen an einem Ort erst, wenn man an einem anderen etwas durchgeführt hat. Das ist leider etwas verwirrend. Open World schön und gut, aber das passt nicht immer.

Für mich eine klare Kaufempfehlung!

+ Spannend gemacht
+ Interessant Story
+ Keybelegung bei Bedarf frei wählbar

+/- Sprungpassagen etwas Wirr und verzeihen selten Fehler
+/- Wird der Hauptstrang nicht durchgegangen kommt häufig ein WTF what's next??? Moment.
+/- Drei mögliche Enden...

- "Bosse", wenn man sie so nennen kann, [spoiler] bis auf Cujo[/spoiler], heftig schwer, sind aber optional.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089680827', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1655471965}
review:
I have finished the game today. Although I can't really call my playthrough "finished", because I didn't complete all the side quests(which doesn't happen to me too often, I usually try to 100% every game possible).. here's why
The game was good, yes. I enjoyed everything about it.. especially the constant updates of the game(at least now, at the end of 2019). 

I'm sure you know about what the game is, so I'm not gonna type anything about that, sorry :(

My feelings overall: Sometimes I got a bit mad about the controls, because it was hard for ME to get used to it.. also I didn't know where to go first most of the time, since there is A LOT to explore(didn't even find anything yet, might get back to it though)
Basically everything was locked from the other side or locked with a key which you had to find.. so either you had to explore more to find another entrance or just hope for the best.
Most of the quests were very well designed, but imho, the developers should add an option to at least reveal locations in ALL the quests(only some have it) for "adventurers" like me(only optional though, so people don't get disappointed about the feeling of them finding something by themselves)
And yes, I had to look for a few guides, because some quests were very hard for me, especially without any minimap or anything(I like it the way it is though, for the realism and stuff).. 
I would also like to point out that you basically don't have to fight anyone(at least I didn't have to too much) which might be both pro and con.
Anyway, thank you for reading my probably pointless review :D Im typing this late at night before I go to sleep, so it might be.. well, useless.

TL;DR- The game is good, but prepare for a lot of exploring and for the struggle of locked doors and many places to go to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165387177', 'num_games_owned': 2712, 'num_reviews': 1147, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1570900595}
review:
[code] 
[h1] 游戏介绍	[/h1]  
《Die Young》是一款由IndieGala独立制作发行第一人称视角的开发式动作冒险游戏。游戏讲述了一个喜欢刺激的女主角，在和朋友探索一座荒岛的时候，发生了不幸，女主角一个人在井里醒来，开始岛屿求生之旅。
IndieGala还制作了一款名叫《Die Young: Prologue》线性流程的动作冒险游戏，游戏故事发生在本作故事的几小时前，特工Nehir潜入了岛上，她的任务是释放被俘虏的人，杀死岛上的N.1领袖，然而，任务失败了，她需要前往回合点，开始一场自救或是死亡之旅。有兴趣的小伙伴可以试一下。
[/code]  

[code] 
[h1] 游戏体验	[/h1]  
[b]游戏玩法 [/b]
本作以第一人称视角开始，优秀的游戏场景画面，美丽的风景中暗藏杀机。游戏的操作方式简单，上手比较容易。主人公是一个喜欢寻求刺激冒险的女孩，和一帮志同道合的朋友来到了这里，但是不幸的事情也就此发生了。我记得我被活埋了，然后我在一口井里醒来，头有些痛，有人搬开了上面的盖子，我爬上去却并没有看见人。饥渴难耐的我只好先去找水和可以用的东西。我们需要收集食物，水，药草等资源，来生存下去，同时探索岛屿中神秘的场景遗址，在开放的大场景地图中，根据任务提示行动，有地图，背包，制作，任务，文档和笔记等6个菜单项目可以查看，并且找寻可以使用的装备，武器，以及升级鞋子，跑的快来躲避危险，或者躲藏在草丛中避免被发现，进入敌人视野敌人头上会出现一个眼睛的图标，当图标满了他就会追你，前期遇见屠夫基本就凉了，所以尽量避免战斗，只要有体力就跑，穿过栅栏或者爬石头什么的，一般很难追到你，脱离范围自然就安全了。嗯这是一款荒岛求生+极限跑酷的游戏，当然后期也可以揍他们！前期就是木棍打打老鼠，老鼠居然还能捡起来。。血肉模糊的样子，这里建议打老鼠的时候蹲下打，一棍子打俩，还能注意不被咬到。遇见狼或者狗跑，躲屠夫，后期还会出现弓箭手和蝙蝠。用毒针和小刀等武器可以边跑边揍下试试。我比较怂！吓死我了，被屠夫拿着镰刀吓得躲在向日葵田里面不敢动。
[b]游戏特点 [/b]
优秀的游戏场景画面
美丽的风景暗藏着各种各样的危险
荒岛求生极限运动跑酷结合的多样性游戏玩法
用日志等描述事件，构建剧情
[b]游戏感受 [/b]
一款十分不错的大逃杀加生存探索游戏 ，以女性为主角，第一人称视角让人有一种极致的参与代入感，攀爬岩壁，左右移动伸手跳过去抓住边缘在上去的感觉十分棒，有种攀登和跑酷的感觉，我们需要注意我们的水和食物以及血量，寻找资源补充得到一些日记，收集到的日志可以了解到一些岛上发生的事，我的英文不好，多数都是朋友帮忙翻译的，还是有朋友好啊~
摘果子充饥，寻找水源，整个地图场景很大，可以看到很美的风景，还有个人在前面骂骂咧咧的- -我怕那个人打我，还是回去搜屋子了，在屋子里找到日志和扳手喝水之后，我往向日葵田地走的时候，居然看到一个人的断腿！前方不久就是她的尸体！哦！no，我看到了拿着镰刀的屠夫！躲进田里蹲着走，居然又看到了血腥的尸体，这部分音乐营造的十分不错，很有那种危险的气氛，跑起来的时候按蹲下就是滑行的动作，真的是很有跑酷极限运动的感觉。女主角就是很喜欢刺激的极限运动，现在在这个岛上正好用上了~
这款游戏2017年曾经发行过A测版本，当时测试版是有部分中文翻译的，不过现在的正式版还没有正式支持，我们需要完整的中文。
[/code] 

[code] 
[h1] 推荐	[/h1]  
[b]优秀美丽的游戏场景 [/b]
[b]紧张刺激的极限跑酷和荒岛求生探索搜集的游戏玩法[/b]
[b]用日记来描述岛上发生的事件 [/b]

[h1] 建议	[/h1]   
[b]我们需要完整的中文 [/b] 

[h1] 总结	[/h1]  
本作有着优秀的游戏场景，美丽的风景，背景音乐配合敌人的出现营造一种紧张的游戏氛围，紧张刺激的极限跑酷攀登或是越过栅栏，（小心摔死！）。荒岛求生（要注意补充水份和食物）探索（遗迹，洞穴等等）搜集（草药，果子，武器，装备等等）制作（毒针，鱼叉等等），各种各样的敌人（蛇，屠夫，人，蝙蝠等等），一些剧情任务（爬上井，下塔等等）用可收集的日记等等来描述岛上发生的事件等等游戏玩法十分丰富~建议喜欢大逃杀，或者是动作冒险的玩家来玩，体验作为一位极限挑战爱好者的荒岛之旅~
[/code]

[quote]游玩百态，将游玩心得用汉语化作玩家的指明灯，(๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧ 
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35402408/]点击这里关注汉化语录~[/url] 如果喜欢这个评测，请点个赞让更多人看见[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198355786045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6744, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6670, 'last_played': 1570864868}
review:
しばらく忘れていたら、正式版が販売されていたので早速やってみました。
アーリーアクセス版の時もやっていましたが、どんどん面白くなって正式版も楽しかったです。
エンディングはいくつかあるようで、2回クリアしました。
ただやはり英語だけなので、日本語対応してくれたらもっと楽しめると思うので、日本語対応を強く希望します。
とにかく、くまなく注意を払わないと実績はなかなか解除できないと思いました。早く全部解除したいと思っています。
あと少しバグがある様で、何回も同じアイテムが取れたり（缶詰や食べ物でなく）全く関係ないところにコレクターの石碑が出てきたりしました。（1個）ただゲームは普通に出来たので問題ありません。
海外のゲームだからかもしれませんが、日本のゲームではあまり考えられないような選択肢があるのには驚きました。
また、結局最後まで何のためにあるのかわからないオブジェクトがあり、まだ違う選択肢があるのか謎です。
私はこのゲームをセールで1200～1300円くらいだったので、それでこれだけ楽しめれば十分お得だと思いました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198065867547', 'num_games_owned': 729, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 1189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1189, 'last_played': 1570295061}
review:
Nice climbing game with action/survival elements. Pretty big open world with plenty to explore. Nice side quests and interesting main story with 3 different endings. Can be a bit tedious in some parts (I mean high tower climb). Have some minor bugs in current release and some issues with performance. But it seems latter was fixed in last update. 
All in all - good game and worth its price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083293364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 1229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1229, 'last_played': 1570297745}
review:
It's OK. 20h in, 100% through, would not recommend. Terrible fighting system, below average sneaking system, boring story, very little voice acting to support said story, tons of useless crafting items.

It's a commendable effort, but there are too many actually good games out there to play this. Worth a sneak peek at 5 bucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001490367', 'num_games_owned': 650, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 2283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2283, 'last_played': 1569514091}
review:
[h1][b]”A beautiful summer trip with B-Movie feelings that you won’t forget.”[/b][/h1]
Die Young is a first-person adventure with survival and exploration aspect. It used to be early access project started in 2017, developed and published by IndieGala. I bought when it’s first available and have a chance to complete full playthrough in final version (2019).

[h1]Beautiful Horror[/h1]
Die Young told the story of teenage group trapped in an unnamed island in the Mediterranean Sea during a private trip. You play as Daphne, a young girl who enjoys extreme sport and risking (which explains how she’s capable of athletic skills). Daphne’s motive is to escape from island along with her friends. The more Daphne explores, the more she learns the truth of island and rural community that keep her away from freedom. Player also learns a bit of Daphne’s backstory during resting.

Die Young sets in the fictional island during hot Mediterranean summer, covered in beautiful landscape and various landmarks from sunflower field to mysterious ancient ruins. Decent variety of wildlife scatters around the island. Some are harmless, some are not. I enjoy the scenery and setting of Die Young as the contrast between beautiful colorful nature and gruesome horrors.

There’s also Die Young Prologue chapter for free that give bit of story and connection to main game, although it focuses on more stealth and action gameplay.

[h1]Instinct, Strength, Movement[/h1]
Die Young gameplay consists of three main aspects; exploration, survival, and combat. Player is free to explore from start. Exploration is optional and not mandatory as your ultimate goal is to escape from the island. However, each landmark you visit may grant you optional task to deeply explore which reward you useful items/supplies or reveal backstory of the island. Some areas might provide key items for survival or main story. I personally like the way the game doesn’t hold player hand, but give hint or graphical design to let players choose if they feel like to.

As you start playing from the beginning, you will realize how the parkour system works as one of highlight feature. You’ll work around jumping, leaping, and climbing. It’s more grounded and bit different than other parkour FPS like Mirror’s Edge, because there’s stamina bar that indicate how long you can hold on ledge before you fall. Stamina will decrease slowly while holding ledge and deplete faster when leap to grab another. It provides light puzzle to encourage player to carefully learn environment especially some late areas. Even running and jumping across the gap can be challenged as you might need to maintain speed and momentum. The fine mixture of both indoor and outdoor parkour keeps engaging due to more complexity of environment design. Despite of graphical hint that could ruin immersive for some players (I wish it could tone down or disable in option), Die Young provides strong sense of human movement (functional and weighty) and feeling (anxiety and unsettle of height). Conquer The Stone Pillar is one greatest climbing experience for me.

[h1]Tools for Survive[/h1]
Unlike most survival games, Die Young has no hunger mechanic and building shelter, player only look out for thirst and health meter. Luckily, you can easily restore dehydration from fruit tree, food, and fresh water pool scattering around the island. Same as herbs and materials, player can craft tools and medicine to survive or solve some puzzles. Hunting small animals for hide to expand inventory and more. All you need is to obtain prototype item to learn crafting. Player can trade Owl statue (collectable) to trader for some special items.

I found survival mechanic and saving are basic and pretty generous. Even people who don’t like survival aspect can enjoy the game as it provides difficulty slider that player can change anytime in option. Some players might have hard time for inventory management in first few hours, but you will access more key items, and shelter (for item storage, rest in night, and fast travel). My only gripe is lack of sorting option in inventory and incorrect display of some weapon durability.

[h1]A bit wonky, but still punchy[/h1]
Beside of running away and hiding, Die Young features melee combat. Every tools and melee weapon has basic light attack, charged attack that deal more damage, and block. Melee combat feels weighty, but clumsy at the same time due to inconsistent hit registration and disconnect between animations. There is a lot of threat from wildlife animals to armed mercenary, even boss type enemies that can chase you mercilessly. But I’m bit disappoint on human enemy as you can cheese AI or get them stuck in geometry, They also lack enemy type and tactic AI approach because once player obtain crossbow / molotov. Fighting them is quite a walk in the park.

[h1]Audio / Soundtrack[/h1]
Die Young features high-quality surround sound to create believable environment (animal, Daphne movement and reaction, ambient). Feedback combat sounds delivers quite solid. Soundtrack features few interesting songs from indie Rock bands along with progressive rock and synthwave music. It may not suit perfectly for everyone, but I found it oddly fit to theme and setting. It gives me strong vibes of old B-movie thrillers / horrors. 

[h1]Performance[/h1]
Die Young is powered by Unreal Engine. The graphics was changed and improved drastically during in development (textures, lighting, and tone) which are in good way. Most areas are well-optimized although some are still noticeably strutted and lack of indoor shadow (ambient occlusion doesn’t help in this case).

Overall, the game delivers good performance despite of some technical issues and crashes on my decent PC. I doubt it would relate to some of my outdated software. So, the problem can be different for each user.

[h1]Closing[/h1]
Die Young may suffer from some technical issues and wonky melee combat. But it’s refreshing with setting and well-balanced survival/story-driven campaign. Engaging player with light puzzle and fluid parkour movement. You might not expect full AAA quality, but with price (~$10 in my country) and effort that developers keep improving the game. An experience worth remembering. Highly recommend

[quote][i]If you found this review helpful, please consider and give a thumb up, any feedback and exchanging idea are very appreciated[/i][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198010736559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2038, 'last_played': 1570258848}
review:
10/10 would fall from the Stone Pillars again.

Glad that combat was often an, albeit challenging, option despite the whole "RUN. HIDE. FIGHT." leaning of the game. I suck at platforming and it took a LOT of tries to get some finicky jumps just right - I got frustrated a few times but timely save points prevented me from rage quiting after pitching myself off of a mountain a dozen times at certain points.

The game has decent graphics, GREAT atmosphere, and a pretty cool story. I would welcome a 2nd instalment of this! Get cracking!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198032197570', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1578152283}
review:
Ist eigentlich nicht so meins spiele eher Fallout oder Skyrim in VR,
aber grafisch ganz gut, gute Story und im einfachsten Schwierigkeitsgrad auch für mich spielbar.
Manchmal etwas Leerlauf, keine Gegner nix zu finden, dann aber wieder spannende Kletterpartien. 
Ich habe es im Angebot gekauft und kann es empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026767411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 1638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1638, 'last_played': 1570155135}
review:
Its a good game, beautiful world. Came a hell of a way from early access gameplay.world design wise.  The one issue is difficulty and it may be just the gamer in me but i started on the hardest setting and the only thing to kill me or come close to it [yes i killed the huge "bosses" also completely optional btw] was missed jumps or falling. 

The one thing this game got by far that no other game has gotten right is climbing.. Its so much fun. The most fun is around the area called high tower. Tooooo much to climb and explore and have fun with. 

Only down side is no swimming but its obvious as to why no swimming. Youd skip 99.9% of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056164629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2517, 'last_played': 1570120086}
review: This is a good thing. I sort of run a collection of first-person survival games, and it's a fine addition. I'm glad it has been released.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295302795', 'num_games_owned': 674, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1570277027}
review: Very refreshing to see a game like this. Mix of survival and story driven game. First few hours of the game is perfect, it leads you trough creepy island with some pretty creepy things happening. Crafting, looting, killing and a lot of running around is very interesting for the first few hours (4-5). After that you are just repeating exactly the same tasks only rushing to finish the story (which is not so bad) but it gets you walk for hours and hours until you finally find an item or a key that will help you to progress. If you are fan of survival games definitely a recommendation anyhow it gets boring after some hours of gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141748420', 'num_games_owned': 386, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1608, 'last_played': 1570051293}
review:
Not a AAA title
But great game, interesting story, hard to learn, hard to master.


Parkour is fantastic, game is large and you need to discover everything yourself. Its great game for someone, who does not like to be lead by hand.

IF you have time, patience and if you enjoy good movement in the game. This game is worth it. Its really underrated.

Played it on stream, 25 hours

author: {'steamid': '76561198079247468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1570550775}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198066701387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2738, 'last_played': 1570914319}
review: Ich habe dieses Spiel durch ein letsplay kennen gelernt und musste es mir dann aber selbst kaufen, um das Feeling selbst zu erlauben. Ich spiele es seit der early access vor 2(?) Jahren. Das Spiel reizt durch seinen steten Fortschritt und den freien Erkundungsmöglichkeiten. Man fängt mit nichts in den Händen an und freut sich über jeden Gegenstand, den man findet und der einen weiterhilft. Die Kletterpartien machen Spaß und werden mit der Zeit anspruchsvoller. DIe Gegner sind eher "meh", die ziellos in der Gegend rumlaufen. Erst die großen Brüder stellen eine Herausforderung dar. Ich mag es zudem gern mal eine Frau als Hauptcharakter zu spielen. Ein paar Fragezeichen sind Story mäßig dennoch geblieben, aber insgesamt hat mir das Spiel großen Spaß gemacht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005507174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3609, 'last_played': 1569943704}

author: {'steamid': '76561198073203998', 'num_games_owned': 609, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1086, 'last_played': 1570295426}
review: Non farò una recensione pomposa e lunga da leggere. Vado subito al dunque. Questo gioco è bellissimo e non solo merita di essere giocato ma è proprio un must have per qualunque videogiocatore che si definisce tale. E' un tipo di esperienza che non potete perdere. L'amore nello svilupparlo trasuda da ogni angolo della sconfinata mappa. Tirate fuori i pochi spiccioli che servono, acquistatelo e giocatevi questo capolavoro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085785534', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2076, 'last_played': 1676392969}
review:
I love this game. I played since the first Alpha and could see how they implemented new features as new areas or enemies.
And I absolutely love the athmosphere. Especially the music fits the game perfect in most situations so feel even more emerged.

The parkour is great, I had no problems (except a few times when I felt too confident ;) ) but I'm playing with a controller, don't know how it is when using the keyboard.

The game is very much recommended for anyone looking for a game where you don't get everything told completely but have to look for yourself and find a solution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021466054', 'num_games_owned': 1270, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1471, 'last_played': 1569853161}
review:
tl;dr: Mediteranes Survival Abenteuer mit Parkour, Kampf und Stealth. Riesige, gut ausgearbeitete Karte, die sich aber manchmal ein wenig zu linear anfühlt. Story ist originell, wenn auch stellenweise etwas arg an den Haaren herbeigezogen. Ohne Lösung ca. 25 - 30h für den ersten Durchlauf. 8/10 Kaufempfehlung

Vollständiges Let's Play: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGJw-dbWoYqIN4_h4qj4HBdd3tcPbedai

author: {'steamid': '76561198023312777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 3350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1768, 'last_played': 1571575891}
review:
Buy this game if you have a lot of time and patient. Large map to discover, slowly improving crafting system, hard fights. You also need good reflexes to climb and jump. 
Success feeling is great because the game is not easy. 
Absolute fun for it's small price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983674354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1569797172}
review: Hm, es ist neu und kostet die Hälfte und genauso viel ist es Wert. Landschaftlich einmalig, eindeutig Europa, Mittelmeer würde ich tippen. Die Sonnenblumen sind ein wenig zu Steif geraten, da wurde beim Programmieren anscheinende etwas gespart, so ähnlich bei den menschlichen Gegnern, aber noch hinnehmbar. Bei den übrigen Pflanzen ist es alles nicht so auffällig. Die Welt ist relativ überschaubar, da aber irgendwann erbitterter Widerstand zu spüren ist, kommt man auch auf Helgoland nicht mehr weit, etwas größer wird es schon sein. Schwer zu sagen ob es gut ist, aber jedenfalls hat es was eigenes, interessantes, dadurch fast schon besser wie mancher AAA Nachfolger. Vollkommen den Erwartungen entsprochen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010545064', 'num_games_owned': 1436, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1229, 'last_played': 1569749469}
review:
Gra bardzo dobra, drogie INDIEGALA powinniście zajmować się survival horrorami :D
Plusy:
+Eksploracja (Pełno ciekawych miejscówek)
+Historia (Bardzo ciekawa, opowiadana przez dialogi,środowisko, oraz notatki)
+Czas gry (Oczywiście dla każdego może być inny, ja natomiast zwiedziłem wszystko co się dało, zrobiłem wszystkie zadania poboczne i dobrze się bawiłem)
+Różnorodni przeciwnicy (Nie jest pełno typów wrogów, jednak każdy tutaj pasuje jak ulał)
+Parkour (Skakanie sprawia frajdę)
+Nienachalny system survivalu (Postać nie musi co 2 minuty zjeść całego prosiaka i wypić 5L wody, żeby przeżyć)
+Posiadanie wyboru na koniec
Minusy:
-Parkour (Znajduje się tutaj jako plus i minus, nasza postać i grawitacja to galaretki - więcej razy zginąłem przez grawitacje niż wrogów)
-System pomocy w parkourze (Ja rozumiem, nie każdy ma powyżej 2 IQ, dlatego oznaczanie gdzie powinno się skakać różnymi albo farbami albo szmatkami czy kredami jeszcze zrozumiem, ale kuźwa jeszcze dodatkowy system do tego, który sprawia, że świat robi się szary a miejsca gdzie powinno się skakać czerwone? Nie traktujcie nas jak jednokomórkowców)
-Nierówność eksploracji, zwłaszcza późniejsza część mapy hmm region drugi (Przez pierwszy region widzimy sceny z horrorów, dużo krwi, no czuć lęk, niestety później gra przeradza się w ciągnięcie historii, a jedyne straszne rzeczy jakie zobaczymy to cholerne węże, dodatkowo drugi region nie jest już tak ciekawy w eksploracji jak pierwszy, za dużo w nim gór, za mało ciekawych miejsc)
-Zbyt oczywiste zakręty fabularne

author: {'steamid': '76561197970679643', 'num_games_owned': 1229, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4544, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2753, 'last_played': 1697489800}
review:
While on a thrill-seeking vacation somewhere off the coast of Turkey, Daphne and her rich, spoiled friends visit a remote island in the Mediterranean Sea. Soon after, they are kidnapped and separated. Finding herself alone in this beautiful but hostile place, our heroine must try to discover the truth of what has happened. Can she uncover the secrets the island hides and find a way back home or, like so many others who have stumbled upon this place, will she [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b]?

In early access for quite some time, the game received a multitude of updates along the way. I played it occasionally for much of its development and every update brought needed and welcome improvements. The final version added a surprisingly large amount of content and added immense areas to explore. While it shares many elements with other games, [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b] has its own unique style. I enjoyed it from the start, but it must be noted that it has design and gameplay components that not everyone will enjoy. A substantial portion of the game requires the player to free-climb to great heights, including jumping from high ledges and traversing a plethora of cliffs and similar locales while gripping narrow handholds with just your fingertips. While many other games involve climbing mechanics, [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b] is the only one I have played that makes me nervous when these areas must be conquered. Many of these spots proved extremely challenging for me (think sweaty palms and queasy stomach) but the story was compelling enough to push myself past them. If you suffer from vertigo or a fear of heights, this may not be the game for you. If you do enjoy such things, however, you will be in free-climbing, parkour heaven.

At this time, [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b] has been officially released but it continues to receive updates. The developers have listened to the players and implemented a great many improvements and it is encouraging that they continue to polish the game. Having said that, it should be mentioned that [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b] is an ambitious game from a small studio. They deserve praise for what they have produced but do not expect a AAA title. The game is quite beautiful and for the most part, runs well, but it still has a few drawbacks that keep it from earning the highest marks. But, for the price, [b][i]Die Young[/i][/b] is a whole lot of game and a whole lot of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986297793', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 2994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2994, 'last_played': 1569622421}
review:
Voilà un jeu que j'ai suivi depuis la béta et que j'ai eu le plaisir de voir aboutir. 
Je souligne que l'équipe a toujours été très dévouée, communiquant avec la communauté, sortant régulièrement des mises à jour et expliquant ses objectifs. Je précise aussi que depuis la sortie officielle début septembre, l'équipe ne s'est pas endormie sur ses lauriers et continue de fournir des patchs.

Le jeu en lui même exploite un bon filon, le survival mêlé à une ambiance teintée d'horreur, un système de parkour, d'escalade et d'infiltration.

Le scénario est simple : Vous êtes en vacances sur une île paradisiaque avec quelques potes quand une bande de maboules vous capture et vous abandonne au fond d'un puits. Vous devrez vous sortir de cette situation en explorant, en volant ou craftant vos outils et armes, en essayant de comprendre l'histoire de l'île et ce qui est arrivé à vos potes.

Au rang des grandes qualités de ce jeu, il y a l'ambiance. C'est là une belle réussite. Oui, on a vraiment les chocottes. En particulier au départ. Parce que vous êtes placé dans une situation de proie. Vous êtes traqué et l'environnement est hostile. Au fil du jeu, le scénario ponctué par quelques découvertes macabres maintient un sentiment de malaise. C'est dans l'ensemble assez bien rythmé. En outre, la map est assez grande et on prend plaisir à en explorer les différentes parties pour en apprendre plus.

Une partie du jeu est consacrée à l'escalade et c'est un aspect que j'ai trouvé bien fait et intéressant. Toutefois, une bonne partie de la map est un véritable labyrinthe et cela peut parfois être frustrant, surtout quand on sait qu'une mauvaise chute peut vous valoir de revenir assez loin en arrière.

Maintenant, disons-le tout net, la réalisation est très inégale et on peut trouver autant de qualités que de défauts à ce jeu.

Tout d'abord, le monde paraît hostile mais en fait, les ennemis sont scriptés et une grande partie de l'île est déserte. Voilà le problème numéro 1 du jeu. Si les ennemis pouvaient se déplacer librement sur la carte et vous traquer, Die Young prendrait une toute autre dimension.

C'est pas grave me direz-vous, il reste l'aspect infiltration. Alors oui, ça marche assez bien. On peut s'amuser à passer dans le dos des ennemis. Mais il faut reconnaître qu'après avoir bien avancé dans le jeu, par lassitude ou parce que vous passez fréquemment par les mêmes lieux, vous finirez par buter tout le monde. 

Concernant le système de craft, c'est pas trop mal fait mais ça reste sommaire. Par ailleurs, la faim et la soif ne sont là que pour faire beau car elles n'ont pas de répercussion sur les performances de notre héroïne. Je ne vois donc pas bien l'intérêt.

Donc, au final, il y a pas mal de vernis dans ce jeu et le sentiment que certains aspects auraient pu être encore meilleurs.
Mais malgré ses défauts, on ne s'ennuie pas dans Die Young et c'est une expérience plaisante qui vous tiendra en haleine une bonne vingtaine d'heures. Je vous le recommande.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970577430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1053, 'last_played': 1569519498}
review:
Excellent game!

The story is interesting, with subtle clues about what is going on sprinkled throughout the landscape.
The gameplay works quite well, the parcour movement wonderful and the main character has the right amount of cursing and charm.
Graphics are good, the houses/indoors look a bit dull sometimes but the outdoors (which are the majority) look really lovely and well made.

The level design of the areas is really really good! The way certain areas connect to one another and you come back to areas you've been before is really well done, haven't seen that in quite a while even on tripple A games. A really welcome difference to the usual one-way levels you often have.

Puzzles are not too many but well put together and since the game is open world you actually can go and progress as you see fit.
When I first played through (there's several endings and you have to do different things to get to them) I actually hadn't found all my friends yet, so I strolled back around areas I've already been to and found the last missing one in a place I was quite surprised I haven't seen before because I was always going a different way.

Overall difficulty wasn't high, combat got really easy after a certain point, but it never bothered me at all. Exploration and finding the hidden items made it all up.

Absolutely would recommend this game to anyone who likes a good story, a bit of puzzling and exploration! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198032263049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1063, 'last_played': 1593849024}
review:
Играл с версии 1.0 и то что русский язык отсутствует, это напрягает.Тут такой текст порой, что и онлайн словарь все времена попутает. Немного хваставства (я убил вначале игры без читов и трейнеров Палача и Брата №2). Очень сочные боссы. А теперь по порядку. Остров на котором происходит всё действо большой и разнообразный, а движок Unreal 4 ему очень помогает раскрыть красоту местного мира. 
- Сложно? 
- Да! (особенно на хардкоре!) 
- Интересно? 
- Да. 
- Почему? 
- Увлекает загадочностью и разнообразием.
Из минусов хочу отметить что игра бывает вылетает ни с того ни с чего, но редко. (На момент версии 1.0) но разработчики постоянно её обновляют. Сегодня 25.09.19, за один день 2 обновления. и уже версия 1.0.14.20
Оптимизация хромает. Причём на обе ноги. у меня geforce 1070 и intel 6820HK. Так вот фризы и лаги переодически - это нормально. И самая большая претензия! Как в выживастике нету лука карл? Почему его нету?! Нет главное палки и веревки для крафта есть, а натянуть одно на другое никак нельзя! Ну вообщем надеюсь разрабы контент будут добалять, а лаги убирать. Вердикт такой. Если любите остросюжетные триллеры и выживание с элементами исследования, то брать однозначно! 450р за эту игру это немного,а увлечёт она не на один вечер.
