review: Нельзя! Нельзя покупать такие игры в раннем доступе... Это издевательство, с каждым шагом становится все интереснее. И тут ты доходишь до определенной точки, и увы, ждите обновление. Игра шикарная, жду обновы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353921693', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1518125370}
review:
This game has beautiful graphics.
However, that is only thing it has.
Someone promised me Dying Light experience and all I see is no parkour at all, millions of bugs and the thing that triggers me so damn hard.. YOU INSTANTLY DIE FROM LIKE 2M FALL!! Like what the fuck??????????????????????? How do you die dude I could survive like 10m fall in real life and this bullshit kills me if I fall from like 2m? Seriously? Developers? Nice parkour? Also what the fuck is wrong with the big guy? He has like 200 pounds of items on him and weights double that and runs like a fucking FLASH that you can't even outrun him?? Dogs see you from like 100km unless you camp fucking bushes whole game like a pussy?? You dehydrate in like 5 minutes of gameplay and finding water is harder than finding God's path to Heaven?? Are you serious, developers? I feel like this game is a troll and I hope you do something about it because this is fucking disgrace and making fools of players. Don't have a clue why this game was released, this is too shitty even for a test game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116146168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2062, 'last_played': 1696437796}
review:
Jó játék, bár nem ártana még egy kissé optimalizálni. ( rosszul érint mikor 15-ször kell próbálkozni átugrani egyik szikláról a másikra az akadások miatt. ) Gondolom ez is meg lesz idővel.
A kezdeti nyomasztó hangulat, görcsölés és félelem a szigeten fellelhető ellenségektől lassan elmúlik és felváltja a "gyere ide széjjelváglak" érzés. Érdemes is vadászni ( leginkább csak farkasra illetve blökikre ) hiszen alapanyagot tudunk gyüjteni amivel upgrade-elhetjük a cuccainkat.
Nekem bejött a játék. 
A történet jó, a grafika illetve hangok ott vannak és mászás közben igencsak figyelni kell, hogy hova nyúlsz!  
Megérkezett, teljes lett, kétféle befejezéssel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017077425', 'num_games_owned': 336, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1517166391}
review: The atmosphere and general idea of the game looks -it looked to me- promising and compelling. After one hour of struggling to survive for no reason and with no goals, I got bored to death and deinstalled. Absurd missions like "find a key to open that door to rescue that guy". I'd ask the devs: Find a key where? In a whole fu  c k ing island? Where am I supposed to start searching? Inside a building? In a piece of furniture? In the middle of a huge sunflower field? Maybe inside the as s of a wondering dog? Yeah, thanks for so many hints and clues. Thanks for so many opportunities to find water before thirsting to death. Thanks for making so clear what the aim of the game is, apart from none -unless roaming from here to there trying to to dehydrate is an aim at all. Then absurd things like: what the f*** is an executioner with a huge axe doing while he wanders by a sunflower field, for no reason, in the sunlight of an otherwise beatiful Mediterranean island? I bet your argument isn't he's so evil he just roams the island because he's waiting for the videogame player to try and escape only to find him and kill him? And yet -why the medieval disguise? Why the inquisition axe? Why can he roam the island happily all the time in an otherwise beautiful morning while you can't walk 200 metres without dying from dehydration? If there had been friendly islanders to talk to, the game would have made much more sense and been much more interesting than running away from an absurd just-because villain while trying to get to nowhere because the game offers little more than some jumping parkour. Maybe for 50 cents the game could pay off to get a few screenshot for wallpaper. Period. Otherwise do NOT buy, it's a pile of unplayable turd.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272099881', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1208, 'last_played': 1541917464}
review: 画风可以，剧情也有种朦胧神秘的感觉，但是总体感觉欠佳，因为有很多让人哭笑不得的bug，比如说一些要通过支线任务或者需要自己探索的物品在你还没来得及去找的时候会让人惊喜地出现在物品栏里（这种是对玩家有益但还是要修正的bug），有些bug是直接影响到任务完成的bug，比如有个任务叫bad romance的任务叫玩家去找一个女人（一个已经变成尸体的女人）那个女人被一根绳子吊在一个房梁上，玩家需要走上房梁用小刀割断绳子让尸体掉到地上才能对尸体进行搜身，然后你会发现割断绳子之后尸体直接卡在了半空中，而且无论玩多少遍尸体必定会卡在半空中，卡的高度和姿势竟然还都是一样的。。。这个任务便无法完美完成了。游戏给的物品都只能算是工具，武器少之又少，造成玩家的无助感加强，是游戏的一大特点。跑酷也是一大特点但是很容易死容易会让玩家大骂“cao！”然后死了之后重来的加载速度还奇慢，这时玩家的心里会难受的一比。。。顺带一提，这个游戏的音乐很好听，各种地方的bgm都出奇的好听，而且这个游戏中所有尸体的样子都会有种诡异的美感。。。可能是我个人审美有问题吧。。毕竟还是半成品，希望这个游戏越来越完善吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198086745517', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 2315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1572217615}
review:
Едрить меня в корень. Вот не люблю я игры в раннем доступе, потому что они обычно очень сильно сырые и убогие. Однако это не про эту игру.

Честно, я думал когда покупал, мол попаркурю немного, скидка у игры большая, много от неё не жду. И тут я обалдел.

Игра играется отлично, паркур не багует, враги больно бьют и выполняют главную функцию - охотников. Эта игра самый яркий пример того, когда ваш герой не рохля, но и не Рэмбо, вы не можете тут убивать маньяков и животных пачками (хотя убить их можно, но очень тяжко, вы же Дафна, спортивная мажорка, а не Майк Тайсон). Вы реально как загнанная несчастная девушка носитесь от смертельных преследователей, причём вас реально преследуют, упорно и долго. Особенно мне зашло, когда за мной бегали 10 собак, о да, я прям как у себя в городе оказался, очень мило.

Сюжет неплох. Он ещё не закончен, но мне нравится его готовая часть. Щас я тут загоню свои догадки, можете не читать этот абзац, читайте ниже. Жила была Дафна, в детстве батька её постоянно брал в походы на природу, где учил выживанию, росла она беззаботно, богато, тусила, отрывалась. Однажды с лучшей подругой Дженнифер она встретила Рашида, тусовщика, который им предложил тусануть на острове. Поехали шумной компанией отдыхать. Там на них напали маньяки. Маньяки часть туристов убивают сразу и на корм собакам пускают, а часть оставляют жить, чтобы мучить и охотиться на них. Как я понял, есть кто-то, кто заманивает людей на этот остров для отдыха, а потом местные маньяки развлекаются. Ещё на острове есть мирные местные, которые тусуют на другой части острова, подальше от маньяков. И походу Дафна должна найти друганов, кто жив, разобраться с зазывалой на остров и смыться живой. Наверняка я нифига не понял и всё переврал, но я так понял сюжет.

Музыка. О да, тут просто шикарный саунд, особенно в горах, нью ретро вейв, еее, а ещё рок и т.д. Короче, я уже добавил себе в плеер, отлично ложится на игру.

Враги. Добавьте побольше маньяков, пожалуйста, и пусть они будут уникальными. У каждого своя пуха, своя внешность и чтобы каждого убить было нереально тяжко, но можно и после чего они умирают окончательно. А то маньяков всего 2 вида, один громила и куча охотников с луками. Не знаю, пусть будет маньяк с бензопилой, маньяк с арбалетом, снайпер, собачник, ветеран войны (не знаю, вьетнамский, например) с ножом и т.д. Ну и чтобы они имели свой распорядок дня, каждый из них занимался своим делом в зависимости от времени суток. А ещё взаимодействовали, например, общались между собой, шутили кто больше наубивал или ругались. Соответственно уникальные характеры и фишки, типа пришёл в горы, а там снайпер живёт, везде красные флажки висят для отслеживания дуновений ветра при стрельбе, ветеран в лесу с волками живёт, капканы ставит и оставляет вьетнамские метки для того, чтобы ловушки можно было различать. Тогда станет на порядок круче, гарантирую.

Больше шмота добавьте. Кстати, было бы круто, если одежда бы влияла на геймплей, например, яркие шмотки туристов были более заметными, тяжелее скрываться от врагов, а шмотки местных оборванцев наоборот делали более незаметным. Тяжёлая одежда позволяла больше урона впитывать, но замедляла и т.д.

Больше самодельного оружия. А оружие маньяков можно сделать как оружие с боссов, которое не портится, но и убить владельцев крайне тяжко. Оружие ломается уж слишком быстро, ну реально, два удара и всё, нож или разводной ключ сломались, пусть покрепче будут.

Животных вроде хватает, но можно и их добавить, почему нет.

Карту надо бы поудобнее сделать, а то она высвечивается не вся, а кусками, не шипко удобно я вам скажу, ибо чтобы увидеть другой её кусок, то надо за край нынешнего куска уйти, только тогда переключится. Дичь.

Ну и пускай у Дафны побольше будет реакций, диалогов и прочего, а то она сейчас мало комментариев даёт насчёт окружающего, было бы неплохо, если бы в финальной версии она живее реагировала на происходящее, материлась, ужасалась, удивлялась и прочее. Ибо остров в одного нам исследовать надо много, пусть персонаж кажется живей, так исследовать будет интересней.

Ну и всё пожалуй.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054348056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 3344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 949, 'last_played': 1686737106}
review:
Update since the full release is here and i completed it. 
Judging it as an indie game: 9/10

  This game is an amazing example of what an indie early access game should be. A long labor of love by a dedicated team of devs. It took them a while but they never stopped updating and improving the game. I already felt like i got my money's worth before the game was even complete and now that it is, its pretty great. 

  Exploration is great. There are always hidden secrets / equipment / pathways scattered across every location which makes you want to spend time looking around. If is rewarding to spend time just exploring. Although i must admit that it can be a little daunting/confusing in the beginning as one path might lead to others and each of those paths can fork out even more. But i think its fitting for the theme of the game. Being lost and afraid, scavenging to survive. 

  Optimisation could be better but its alright.

  This game is definitely worth the full price. As long as you enjoy survival and exploration. This game is meant to be played sneaky stealth mode, but dont feel like you cant kill everyone. you can. there are ways.

  Ps. Rocks are your best weapon until you get a crossbow. I killed Brother No.3 and beeboi with rocks at a cost of 20 minutes of my time.

review:
Годная игрушка. Красивый графон. Игре ставлю девять мертвых девушек из десяти. 
Экшн на высоте. Квесты не замысловатые, но и не примитивные. Квестов типо "собери сто-пятьсот хреновин" здесь не найдете. Зато паркура - выше крыше. А видео вставки в процессе паркура заставляют потеть ладошки. Вообщем годнота. Может даже не на один раз.

review: 画质很不错，题材也比较有意思，就是一直跑跑跑有点单调，前期敌人打不过只能跑，很憋屈，新手玩起来可能会比较腻。游戏很难上手，一开始完全不知道做什么，只能在地图里瞎逛。不过总体而言还是很不错的，适合解谜跑酷向的爱好者。

author: {'steamid': '76561198166312143', 'num_games_owned': 365, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1559479951}
review: whilst the parkour can take some getting used to and some of the areas need to be refined a little more this is a solid game even in its unfinished state, there are clearly things that need to be worked on (insane fall damage), as with all early access titles it's not finished and everything is subject to change, if you're ok with that then i heartily invite you to play this game, a lot of the systems need to be spiced up a little and whilst the graphics are good (more so with the january update) they could use a little improving. this game is very reminiscent of the farcry series though clearly a little lower budget, my biggest issue is that by the first time you reach a speaking npc you've adjusted to this being a game without people, there are the enemies but they feel more like monsters than people, this means that when you see non hostile npcs with dialogue they seem out of place and almost surreal, i think this game should use an opening cutscene rather than backddrops with narration and maybe introduce the player to the characters friends that way, nonetheless this is all nitpicking, this is a great game and deserves all the support it gets, i have no doubt that with time the game and story will be improved.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045987567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1327, 'last_played': 1549110599}
review: Que dire sur 'Die Youg'? Franchement, à acheter les yeux fermé, c'est une expérience unique. Pour ma part c'est le meilleur jeux que j'ai joué en 2017 et j'en joue des jeux. Graphisme splandides, game play extraordinaire, sénario bien fichu et très strange, ambience mystérieuse parfaitement maîtrisé, immersion totale, des fois je me suis surpris à ressentir ce que ressent le personage comme ci c'était moi. Le jeu est en développement, mais il ne peut que s'améliorer, oui parce que bon il y a encore des petites retouches à faire coté IA des adversaires, même si ce n'est pas l'élément centrale du jeu, mais là j'en dit déjà trop. Laissez vous surprendre. 19.5/20

author: {'steamid': '76561197964628651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 5338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1740, 'last_played': 1706659551}
review:
In brief: This fun, indie  game is beautiful and compelling, and playes well, even though there are a few small gripes and some glitching and stuttering issues, and while it borrows heavily from other games, it handles it's mechanics properly and satisfyingly.

In length: Die Young is an indie climbing-running-fighting-stealth-crafting game, and you should play it.

THE GOOD:
     The climbing is fluid (for the most part--shimmying left or right is tediously slow) fighting feels frantic and exciting until you master the run-in-circles-around-the-enemy fighting technique, Plus you [b]start off[/b] with the ability to [b][i]run long distances[/i][/b] which puts this game [u]lightyears[/u] ahead of games like Dying Light, wherein you ran arduously slowly until you had played for something like 6 quintillion years... or something. 

     Graphically it's pretty nice. UE4 is legit, and I never dipped below 60fps on max settings, even with rendering turned up to 125%.

[b]THE BAD:[/b]
There are some bugs and glitches but they aren't game changers: 

Stuttering, at times, is SO BAD. It's pretty present at the moment, but doesn't interfere with gameplay--MOST OF THE TIME. There is this one part, while climbing the Large mountain I repeatedly died at a specific section due to stuttering causing my inputs to drop. It's bad in places, but manageable.

A specific animation [i](while holding onto a ledge, looking left or right causes the player characters arm to point in that direction)[/i] The players arm crosses [b]between the camera and the ledge you're trying to jump to[/b] causing the reticle to change and the game to think that there's nothing there for you to jump and grab onto. This usually results in a much, [i]much[/i] shorter life expectancy.

Also, after hoisting yourself up onto an object, even if you're holding down sprint, you'll stop sprinting. How many times I've walked peacefully off of a cliff to my death.....

The voice acting on display is pretty average. It isn't great, but it isn't terrible either. There are some great lines of dialogue, and there are some horrible deliveries. 

The story itself isn't great or bad, but I get the impression that the game devs hate socialism, which probably isn't hugely important here....

[b][u]THE UGLY:[/u][/b]
Lets talk about weapon degredation: Here's a few words to get us started:
Fuck fuck fuck fucking shit eat shit you fucking shitting fuck
My father has a shovel that he bought back when our family lived together in columbus, we've used it to plant countless trees, shrubs, bushes, etc.. and we've also used it to dig a million holes. This was 26~ years ago and the shovel is [i][b]doing just fine[/b][/i]. Using a shovel in this game gets you 2-5 holes (depending) and a lot of ANGRY.

I get that weapon degredation is supposed to be somewhat scary (I think, anyway) as it means having to look for new weapons or even just crafting more from scratch--however it's frustrating and stupid in any game, even one such as this where you can create your own. I'd give the degredation system a pass in this game but weapons and tools degrade SO FAST, to the tune of something like 15~ swings and it's broken.

Final word:
All in all, this game is worth checking into. It's easily worth the money and it's hours of fun. I've beaten the first part of the campaign and still come back daily to run around the island, jumping on rocks and bludgeoning dogs. I can't wait to see more content! 

[b]Absolutely recommend!![/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198152597433', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1551748625}
review:
It's a pretty fun game. The gameplay is somewhat similar to Dying Light in the sense that there's light parkour and pretty good in-depth sneaking mechanics. They even went out of their way to explain how the protagonist ended up on the island through a nicely done intro. 

You can visit different landmarks on the map and find things like journal pages and notes that explain what's happening on the island. The animations are pretty good too although there's some slight clipping issues here and there that I'm sure will be fixed in the full game. The graphics are beautiful as well.

There aren't really any major down-sides to the game. It's a good game for the price. I hope in the future they add some more enemies and expand the map some more with new locations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258553148', 'num_games_owned': 753, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1568379549}
review:
这款游戏虽然还是抢先体验版，不过完成度是很低的。

我目前在游戏里遇到了几种敌人：拿着大镰刀的敌人，你看到了只能跑，然后还有一些威胁较小的敌人比如蝙蝠，猎狗，老鼠，毒蛇等，它们都会攻击你。毒蛇和猎狗倒没什么，但蝙蝠和老鼠一看到你就会过来咬你，这就十分不符合常理了。然后战斗的手感也是十分糟糕，打击感很弱，最主要的是好不容易打死了敌人却得不到任何的奖励，没有任何经验值和物品，可以说战斗系统几乎是没有意义的。

游戏里有不少的草药，可以做成一些药品，但是采集数量有限，每一种草药只能采几支，背包系统也是一样，格子十分有限，导致很多物品由于空间不足无法带走，这无疑对收集爱好者和强迫症患者是很不友好的。

跑酷系统和消逝的光芒有些类似，只不过学得不精，因为很不自由，许多地方是不能攀爬的，而且主角自带骨质疏松BUFF，只要是超过3米的地方掉下来就必死无疑，所以游戏过程中死亡也成为了家常便饭，不幸的是存档点又很少，死了就只能从存档点重新开始，这给玩家带来的挫败感是十分强烈的。

这款游戏倒是有一个地方特别惊艳，那就是开始菜单的BGM，这首摇滚乐来自国外一个十分不出名的小乐队，你甚至无法在国内搜到他们的歌曲，但是这首歌从前奏开始就牢牢地抓住了我的耳朵，所以后面我宁愿不玩游戏都要在菜单听歌，可惜如此高水平的BGM依然不能掩盖游戏当前的缺点。

目前来说游戏做得不够好，不过提升的空间还是很大的，我认为这几点得改一改：
1.增加武器多样性，让玩家能制作又多又好玩的武器。
2.提升战斗手感，增加战斗奖励。
3.扩大背包容量。
4.增加跑酷坠落死亡的高度。
5.增加即时存档机制，这一点极其重要，因为最影响游戏体验连贯性的非这一项莫属了。

我仍然对这款游戏持乐观态度，希望将来的更新能把这些问题都逐一解决，但当前游戏的素质是我无法予以推荐的，如果将来游戏能更新到我满意的程度，那我一定会改为好评。希望制作组加油！

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2020年03月29日更新：

十国语言无中文，连土耳其语和匈牙利语都支持就是不支持中文，这是态度问题吗？我看不是，而是故意这么做的，所以我决定从今日起永久给予差评。

author: {'steamid': '76561198015829116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1515974967}
review:
Игра посвящается флорафилам и графодрочерам (я отношусь к обоим), которые в меру увлекаются паркуром, любят играть за тян, которые стонут при любом движении, и зашвыривать камнями любую надоедливую живность (да, камни наше лучшее оружие здесь - не палки, ломы, или ножи. Камни. Забивай ими всех до смерти)
Сюжет? - Очередная безумная история. Зачем все портить кровью, трупами, мухами над ними и прочей гадостью вроде жиротрясов с косами?

Единственный минус - нельзя лечь в траву, закурить её же и полюбоваться психодеским приходом глядя на всю ту же самую фауну и небо.

Играть исключительно на Ультра настройках в 4к разрешении

author: {'steamid': '76561198257652059', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 654, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1515143332}
review:
很惊艳的一款游戏，本来并没有缘分能关注到这款游戏
但是STEAM神奇的算法把它摆在了我的首页上。


相当惊喜
不管是惊喜不断的剧情[spoiler]想找的同伴都惨死[/spoiler]，还是优美的画质
再加上开放世界的设定
让我在被狗追的路上一去不复返了

缺点是找东西真心抓狂
每个关卡点跑来跑，到后面发现自己还是没收集完的时候，小心脏揪着揪着痛
只能拿刀捅狗泄愤
缺少必要的指引容易让人自爆


7/10很不错的一款攀岩，潜伏游戏（其实你跑起来没人能追上你，而且你跑到草里NPC就瞎了）
[spoiler]也许是风吧[/spoiler]


最后 游戏优化真心不错，我一个GT920M居然能保持中低特效30帧    0.0！

author: {'steamid': '76561198062813911', 'num_games_owned': 1958, 'num_reviews': 2050, 'playtime_forever': 2125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1595545362}
review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a first impressions review, and NOT a full review

PLEASE NOTE (2017): Due to recent false accusations of plagarism, I (the reviewer) would like to stress that all these reviews and upcoming reviews are original and are not blatantly copied. Other reviews are used to help stress my point across but are changed in such a way to make the review in my own wording 

UPDATE (30/12/2017): For the next few reviews (before 2018 and if any reviews are written), I (the reviewer) will be adding a new portion to these reviews at the bottom which shows the source of which this review was based on, in response to the recent false accusations of plagarism. Please leave your (constructive) feedback down below about this new addition! [/h1]

Die Young is a game developed and published by IndieGala

Die Young tells a story of a survivor who has been kidnapped by some form of cult on an almost abandoned island. Your job is to escape along with your friends. But it turns out, there are multiple threats lurking around the beautiful, yet dangerous island. You'll have to use your smarts and parkour skills to escape them. Scavenge what you can to survive the island

The story can only unfold as you get further into the game and for an early access game, I'm very surprised at how much the game has to offer, with more to come, I'm 12 hours into the game (at the time of this review) and I still haven't discovered the wholr entire island

I love the quick parkour system, if sometimes flawed at the moment. You run a lot in this game and when you do, you can use your speed as an advantage to quickly hop over objects or even jump from one cliff to another. A think I personally don't like is the climbing system is a bit finiky which I hope they'll fix in future updates

This game has a couple of surprises and a few puzzles that aren't beginner friendly. But as you try and figure it out, you'll appreciate the beauty of the island and more along with other tasks you'll end up doing as well

Die Young, in my opinion, is a really great game that only can get better from here on out if the developers listen to the feedback and improve on stuff! 

I'm actually surprised and very displeased that this game isn't as popular as it deserves to be... hopefully with later patches, it will gain more traction
  
This, in my opinion and out of all the early access games I've played thus far, is definitely one of the most polished, although sometimes buggy and unpolished in certain areas, well put together early access games in my opinion and I can't wait for more updates and more stories to be told!

For an early access game, I'm very susprised that Die Young has a nice level of exploration with some great world design and reminds me of my hometown

The story is interesting and somewhat unique, even though it reminds me of Far Cry 4 and Far Cry 5, even though I prefer Die Young to those two poor excuses of a game. The voice acting is fairly well done and the graphics are really pretty even though there is the odd graphical glitch, weird texture and misplaced NPC

However, Die Young is not perfect and has it's fair share of problems. Some of the enemies can be a bit spongy when trying to kill and some of the animations both from NPCs, enemies and the player look a bit cheap and unfinished and I'm hoping that IndieGala fixes and improves some of these animations

Personally, the parkour segments are a little bit too linear at the moment but can be fixed with later updates. And as I've always said, it could be my perfectionism or mild OCD, but certain texts should have their grammer checked and some of the UI could do with some fixing

However, on the whole, Die Young is a great early access indie game with a lot to offer now and so much potential for the future, I just hope IndieGala will continue to perfect their already strong enough game. I normally don't say this when it comes to earely access games but I would definitely recommend Die Young to anyone who is looking for a different type of exploration game
 
[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198066138294', 'num_games_owned': 2052, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1581978483}
review:
EDIT: 17 Feb 2020
Having played the early access on the below mentioned pc, I now have a nice fullfledged newer pc and I encountered the game again.
And you know what? I love it. I remembered the start (thank heck) So that made it easier. I've at this point (18 hours-ish) finished all achievements I can get. Converted, Cheesed the ever loving hell out of Brother #3 (Sorry not Sorry. He killed me by throwing a rock from a low place while I was high) Escaped. Failed to escape.

Sure it is not combat heavy, but if you know how to click heads you're set. I enjoyed the climbing, finding the shelters makes your life so nice as well. The negative reviews seem to be set on a single purpose game that this game is just not. I still recommend it, even after all these years.

Also I am so lit on the tiny details on the fire extinguishers, I can READ them. Or the god rays when you near the point where you get to climb up to the high tower. The echoing of the voices if the room has a hollow sound to it (high tower, solitary). I adore the sass I can put down as Daphne, I love how committed Brother #1 is (even though he's an oof). I am happy that I have finished the game. That I've taken my time to explore, to find, to search and click so many heads. It was worth my time, and I thank the developers for giving me the opportunity to have done so.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Early access review: 29 Dec 2017
Ok so: first things first- know that my graphics card does not measure up to the minimum requirements.
It is a Nvidia GTX 670. So for all intents and purposes I shouldn't be able to play this.

I've been very pleased to have found out that I can play this- lowering the textures, graphics and render distance has left me with a (less, compared to the video's obviously) beautiful game to play that doesn't crash. controls work, no problems whatsoever.

This alone has caused me to review this positively in the first place. Then the story ended up being great as well. I am ecstatic for this game and I cannot wait for it to actually be finished if it keeps on this path.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132298668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 1844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 876, 'last_played': 1587749550}
review:
Die Young does a great job at making the player feel helpless, which is perfect for the storyline. Granted, the storyline starts out cliche, but changes into something more interesting, involving survival needs and the awe of discovery. Go on through dangerous adventure and chilling confusion as you find out what's happening on the island. Move on or die young. 

Some criticism I have starts with the pathfinding for some of the AI. Animals have moved in some odd ways and I've seen some sliding up ridges, a bit immersion breaking. Also, some enemy characters behave in predictable, stiff fashioned ways that make me want to see more interaction. Just as well, I have rolled my eyes and put my hand to my head many times with the dialogue, and some climbing segments that made me feel like I was climbing towers in Far Cry. (The game is still being worked on so keep that in mind when buying it, as for the time that I've played it so far I can tell you that it has great potential and is no short journey)

Die Young is most similar to The Forest in terms of its survival, setting, and other elements that work well as you are thrown into a place so different than what you're used to. With its own turn on parkour and rock-climbing, there are great places for site-seeing as well as some pretty gratifying feelings after a dangerous ascent.

Overall, this indie game does have flaws but is worth a try, I enjoyed it and think you will too if you are interested.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994768862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1637417299}
review: Not what I expected. The game feels very minimalistic. You have a vast island to explore but the way you parkour and run dont seem smooth. It isnt bad but if you're used to parkour as done in triple A titles it feels a bit lacking. The game is more appealing to "thrill" seekers as it focusses to much on the survival. For a Unreal Engine game the graphics are mediocre at best. The game doesnt feel emmersive as some of the other Unreal games feel like.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188250351', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 2547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 906, 'last_played': 1572610844}
review: Привет! Данную игру я получил в подарок от разработчиков игры студии IndieGala. Конечно же фактор бесплатной игры подымает оценку игре и уважение к разработчикам, но даже если бы мне пришлось покупать данную игру за деньги(а стоит она по сегодняшним критериям не много), то всё равно мой обзор был бы положительным. Всё очень просто это хоть и выживалка, но в ней нет надоедливого сбора ресурсов и отражения нападений на свою базу, которые сейчас присутствуют почти в каждой выживалке. Тут вам предстоит исследовать потрясающей красоты остров. Основой упор в данной игре будет сделан на паркур. За счёт которого вы и будете лазить по высоким скалам, и разрушенным постройкам. Учитывая что это всего лишь альфа версия, то в игре много чего нет. Но даже не смотря на ранний доступ в неё уже можно играть за счёт интереса к изучению сложных и хорошо проработанных строений и локаций. Глядя на историю обновлений, то можно увидеть что обновления выходят регулярно и это говорит что игрой занимаются, так что уверен её не забросят и доведут до ума. Из выше сказанного могу сделать вывод что игра стоит своих денег и её стоит купить даже по тому что с выходом нового контента она будет становиться дороже. И купив её заранее можно сэкономить в последствии. Полное прохождение игры можно увидеть тут: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQZQyUByhzAAYkIhSz1vpgIzflXv4nuTQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198088264980', 'num_games_owned': 604, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1532153293}
review:
[h1] Перед смертью все равны.	[/h1]

Знаете, при первом запуске игры у меня появилось чувство что где то я это уже слышал. Банда молодых и обеспеченных папашеной кредиткой, плывут на остров, чтобы оттянутся по полной. А потом ты просыпаешься в клетке… ну в данном случае колодце. Ничего не напоминает? Как нет? А ну быстро погнал на Рук-Айленд салага, там тебя научат что такое безумие.

[code][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/] Еще больше обзоров на кураторской страничке Dreams of Genesis! Подписывайтесь, с нами весело!	[/url][/code]

Вы играете за молодую девушку Дафну, которая очнулась на дне старого колодца посреди странного острова, неподалеку от берегов Турции. Остров некогда был населен, вон там древнии руины, а вон там некогда богатая вилла, которая стоит с разрушеной крышей. А вон там видишь? То фермерские дома… тоже полуразрушенные. Возникает слишком много вопросов, на которые нам предстоит найти ответы и при этом остаться в живых.

Я б не назвал игру прям таким выживастиком. Это скорее красочная бродилка от первого лица с элементами выживания, такими как крафт, голод и жажда. Хотя с учетом того что это далеко не финальная версия игры, есть шанс что система выживания тут получит парочку улучшений и доведется до ума.

Противников в игре довольно мало, как разновидности так и по наполнению мира. Оно то и понятно, основной упор в игре сделан на исследование, поиск предметов и записей. И если встреча со стайкой крыс или змеей не приносит ничего кроме чувства рутины, то встреча с одичалой собакой повышает уровень адреналина. Что уже говорить про толстяка, встреча с которым приводит в ужас, благо убежать от них довольно легко.

Как реализована система паркура мне понравилось. По предыстории главная героиня увлекалась альпинизмом и скалолазанием, поэтому на вертикальной поверхности она себя чувствует не хуже чем на горизонтальной. Эдакая мартышка. Система достаточно простая для освоения, но в тот же момент требует от игрока сосредоточенности, ведь один промах и вы промахнетесь мимо уступа. 

Графика как для альфы очень и очень неплохая. Природа выглядит красиво и даже не побоюсь этого слова - живо. А вот убранство зданий, особняков и башен выполнено довольно скромно. Но я надеюсь что это все же проблемы раннего доступа и у разработчика пока еще руки не дошли на реализацию хорошего интерьера в большинстве зданий.

А вот к чему нету придирок так это к музыкальному оформлению. Музыка из основного меню так вообще заставляет немного подождать перед тем как нажать на кнопку продолжить.

[h1] Черновик для безумца [/h1]

Если коротко подвести черту, то перед нами уникальный проект на страницах Steam. приключенческая игра от первого лица с элементами паркура и выживания в дикой природе. Проект постоянно дорабатывается, но даже сейчас, находясь в альфе игре есть чем порадовать игроков.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162509134', 'num_games_owned': 656, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 2796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1707, 'last_played': 1570441853}
review:
Been playing this game for some time now on and off and it's pretty good I’ve enjoyed most aspect of it and watching the game progress has been interesting with new areas being unlocked new enemies and different dynamic aspect being put in the game it's definitely getting better, it is early access after all so keep that in mind if you do get the game.

Some things however I’m not too delighted about are that they changed it to a hand to hand combat system which i don't personally like for how the game is. 

I would really like to be able to move around the map when looking at it.

But the biggest thing i shall we say 'hate' about the game is the fact the enemies are SO powerful 3 hits from them and you are pretty much dead but you hit them several times and only a fraction of their health has gone pretty unfair, either that or I just suck at it (:

author: {'steamid': '76561198091206623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1034, 'last_played': 1691031770}
review:
My coworker told me about this game, and mentioned that it's a very visually appealing game, especially for an Indy title.
Before I say anything, I'm going to mention that the game is in Alpha, and what an Alpha.
Die Young has potential to be an awesome game. At the time of writing this, I'm two hours in, have died many times to rough jumps and I'm very impressed with the game so far. I had a true feeling of helplessness while desperately searching for water early on, and after a bit of fumbling with the menu controls, I have the crafting system down. It doesn't try to make crafting overly complicated, which is nice.

So far I've only encountered one major glitch, where I got stuck in some stairs, but other than that, gameplay has been super smooth. Looking forward to going home and starting this title up again and look for Daphne's friends!

EDIT: After playing for a total of about 12.6 hours at this current time, losing a save file and having to restart, and making a ton of progress, I've noticed a few things that irk me a little about this Alpha. The time system is a neat idea, but after almost completing all of the current content available, I'm still on the first day. Apparently after 9pm game time you're able to sleep until morning. I feel that time advances too slow for a game, but that's just me.
I'm surprised at the sheer size of the Island for this early in development, as well. There's a lot of time spent searching for the fast travel locations, but it adds to the feeling of helplessness as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198323832392', 'num_games_owned': 738, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 1648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1648, 'last_played': 1512913741}
review: 游戏整体来说，还是可以的（6.5分），风景的话可美可不美，虽然没有什么剧情，也没有什么看法，还有一些Bug，一些地区的音乐还不错，我很欣赏这游戏的运动，但...却又很让人失望，各种死那头我不说，关键是你这解密难度太高，没有明确指定路线，地图还不可随便看地区或者地方，基本完全满地图找，还不得落下每一个角落，在玩家快通关的时候，还设下重重关卡，装备没找整齐的玩家，爬个高山都爬不上去，是不是又要重新满地图找装备呀！我可以告诉你，我就打这放着不玩了，没那心情跟你满地图的跑，没一点意思！就这样，结束了我对这游戏的旅程，再见！

author: {'steamid': '76561198076131916', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 8214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1693573377}
review:
Sziasztok fiúk lányok a mai játék egy korai hozzáférésű Indie fejlesztés , ami a Die Young címet viseli . Stílusát tekintve Akció, Kaland, Szimuláció amiben Daphne nevű női karaktert irányíthatjuk FPS nézetben . A játék túlélő ,és horrorelemeket is tartalmaz melyben lehetőségünk van tárgyak keresésére ,különböző segédanyagok elkészítésére . Fontos elem még a játékban a Parkour ami elsajátítása fontos momentum bizonyos helyszínek elérése érdekében . A történetet tekintve egy szigetre megyünk nyaralásunk közben a barátainkkal ,mikor is rosszra fordulnak a dolgok . Feladatunk túlélni ,és kideríteni mi történt velünk, és  a barátainkkal . A szigeten lévő furcsa kolónia története is folyamatosan bontakozik ki ahogy haladunk előre a játékban . Játékhoz van Magyar felirat is ami mindenképpen előny az elhagyott feljegyzések megértésében ami segít az angolul nem nagyon tudóknak  :) Egy hátrányt tudnék említeni a játékkal kapcsolatban , ami szerintem belejátszik az eladások gyenge mennyiségébe is. Ez nem más mint a gépigény. Köszönő viszonyban sincs sajnos a leírtakkal. Nekem egy GTX 1070 kellett ahhoz hogy normálisan tudjam futtatni . Persze le lehet húzni a játékot , de akkor borzalmas ronda lesz minden , kicsit úgy éreztem hogy nincs középút a grafikus beállításokkal kapcsolatban. Ha valakinek FPS problémái vannak elsőnek az utófeldolgozás minőségét érdemes lejjebb vennie. Hangulatra viszont rendben van a cucc. 14 euros ár pedig nem sok ennyi tartalomért mert bőven lehet bele időt tolni mire a történet végére érünk a hatalmas ,és ötletesen kialakított szigeten. Parkour és túlélő játékok  szerelmeseinek kötelező darab .Többi kiderül a videómból .

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D7fUxKD5QJE&

author: {'steamid': '76561198125500538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1512456438}

author: {'steamid': '76561198067426463', 'num_games_owned': 185, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1512374061}
review:
After playing some time I must say this game is VERY unique and honestly probably wasn't easy to make. It's very great and I can't wait for it to be fully released. But like any early access game, I have a few caveats.

Performs very well for an alpha release. Albeit not very stable you can get steady frames most of the time if you have a good GPU. You'll barely notice the frame dips here and there.

There's a couple issues I have with the actual surviving part, particularly the climbing and mobs. The climbing mechanic is great but incredibly clunky and annoying. And I love the mobs and the difficulty they bring but the sheer amount of them, and how little you can actually do about them besides running is the one thing that kinda pulls me out of the game.
Bats, rats, dogs and teh odd occultist, sure. but the hawk is absolutely ridiculous.
The only thing I can really do about the hawk is keep away from it. sneaking is impossible, killing it, good luck.

I like that the game is difficult, it makes me try different ways around stuff, but the lack of being able to find weapons strong enough are evven craft them is killing this game. I understand that survival is supposed to be a part of the game, not full time, but to stay alive anyway. I figure a girl in her situation would be trying to get weapons that will actually save her from an accultist with a spiked crossbow. But the best you can do is a Harpoon and it's awesome, but barely damages anyone. The easy to craft knife is only good on small animals. even the shovel isn't that good against occultists.

TL;DR the game is great but needs better weapons and smoother climbing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321265455', 'num_games_owned': 5377, 'num_reviews': 1252, 'playtime_forever': 3757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 854, 'last_played': 1708159028}

author: {'steamid': '76561198193899837', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 677, 'last_played': 1519262395}
review:
This is an amazing game. I've done just about everything I can do in one play through. The parkour is awesome, feels like dying light parkour. Some will say they dont like it, I completely disagree. It makes my damn hands sweat when I'm climbing extremely high. I'm really scared to fall in this game for some reason. The save points do sometimes get frustrating, but it is a survival game, so I suggest you take it slow in order to survive around enemies and difficult climbing areas. You will die, but learn from mistakes and become a better player.

UE4 amazing graphics, such a beautiful game, Immersive and unique atmosphere, all topped off with an amazing story. I really hope the developers keep expanding the game and lengthening the story. Hell, I'd even pay for dlc right now, even in early access. The game is worth more than $15 in my opinion, and I'd recommend it to anyone that enjoys parkour, adventure, survival, horror, and / or atmospheric games. 

Thank you for this experience!

author: {'steamid': '76561197993463430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1432, 'last_played': 1542816013}
review:
とりあえずタワーをクリア。すごく面白い。
ゲーム全体がかなり丁寧に作り込んであり、主人公の挙動がリアルで手応えを感じる。
広大なマップをたっぷり探索出来るしグラフィックも美しく定価でもお買い得だと思う。
スタミナは長持ちで回復も早いのでストレスも無く、スピード感のあるアクションを駆使した逃走や天然立体迷路の攻略が楽しい。
左クリック長押しで溜め攻撃が出来るので、工具を手に入れたらどうしても邪魔な敵は撲殺してしまおう。
ちなみに太陽が北側にあるので、最初は感覚的に方向が掴みにくいかも知れない。
貧しい英語力でも雰囲気的に流れは掴めるが、日本語化とやや不便な地図の改善が望まれる。
あとバナーのきらびやかな主人公はゲーム中の傷だらけで薄汚れた姿に変えた方がいいと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198074224922', 'num_games_owned': 568, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 453, 'last_played': 1511290988}
review:
Really great game! I'm surprised this isn't more popular. 
This is definitely one of the most polished and well put together early access games in my opinion. Can't wait for more updates!

Pros:

- Nice level of exploration.
- Great world design.
- The story is interesting and unique.

Cons:

- Some enemies can be a bit spongy when trying to kill.
- The parkour is a little bit too linear at the moment.

On the whole a great game, I would definitely recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026002038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 2621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1528, 'last_played': 1561631011}
review: This early access game tells a story of a survivor who has been kidnapped by some form of cult on an almost abandoned island. Your job is to escape along with your friends. But it turns out, there are multiple threats lurking around the beautiful, yet dangerous island. You'll have to use your smarts and parkour skills to escape them. Scavenge what you can to survive the island. The story can only unfold as you get further into the game. I love the quick parkour system. You run away a lot in this game, when you do, you can use your speed as an advantage to quickly hop over objects or even jump from one cliff to another. The thing is, some cliffs look as though you might not make the jump. This game has a couple of surprises and a few puzzles that isn't beginner friendly. But as you try and figure it out, you'll appreciate the beauty & other tasks you'll end up doing as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052508914', 'num_games_owned': 734, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1507429248}
review:
After playing this game for 5ish hours, I've decided that I know enough to give the game a review.

The game is pretty good, it's fun and builds suspense in places where it's needed, ex. the [spoiler]Beach House Basement[/spoiler] and other areas. 

Parkour is nice and fluid although a bit tedious. Some parts of Parkour feel nice and fast, where as others are time consuming. There are times where the game punishes you for going to fast and going to slow. Where you're not going fast enough to fully jump 4 times in a row to reach your destination, or you're going too fast you slip off of a ledge like soap.

If you want to use stealth in this game, it's not really worth it. You can easily get from point a to point b just from sprinting and you'll be fine, since enemies have an aggro zone there is no continous chase, also given the fact that you can out climb all of your enemies. You can easily out run any enemy using your surroundings.

Enemies: the Lumberjack and Executioner are the most difficult to fight, mainly due to their huge size and great health making it difficult to kite and kill. Other enemies, such as dogs quite easy during combat. [u]I've literally beaten a dog to death by throwing rocks at it running in circles.[/u] Rats and Snakes are the most minimal, since they can be stoned to death. 

I haven't been getting too far into the story, but from what I've been experiencing it's pretty solid. [u]You're on an island looking for your friends and looking for a way to escape.[/u]

Exploration is exciting and the way it's set up is great. Players are left with a paper map to discover their surroundings not knowing what they'll face. Even though most of the enemies aren't dangerous they are scary during first encounter.

I have many positive and negative thoughts about this game. Even though I have many negatives I would still say that the game is still good. It's kept me interested long enough to get through 5 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026302153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1516162779}
review:
偶然间看到某游民网站提到这款游戏，一看就觉得很喜欢，果断入了手。
说实话，画面很不错，优化也很棒，游戏性和动作流畅程度都很满意。整个故事也十分简单，刚开始的也没什么教程，但是慢慢玩会发现游戏性蛮高的。各种飞身跳跃，各种攀爬移动。解密的要素都还可以接受。
目前不知道是不是通关了现有版本。（就是上了高塔拿到了对讲机）。
但是感觉整个故事才是刚刚开始。
期待后面的更新。
总得来说是款很好玩的游戏。打分的话8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198363704641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1609813600}
review: good

author: {'steamid': '76561198013903364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1707, 'last_played': 1569071546}
review:
我的第一篇评测！游戏值得我拿起笔，啊不，在键盘上敲下面一堆字！哪怕没人看。

个人感觉很有诚意的一部作品，物美价廉！物美价廉！被淹没在各种所谓的大作里，很可惜！良心的价格，良心的开发商，有那么点深意的剧情，难度适中的设定，比较养眼的画面，没有详细的攻略是个小的挑战，促成了这个我认为不错的游戏！是很好的游戏！

一开始，看了大家的评测，发现说不好操作，确实，一进游戏会有这种感觉，但是当你溜达了几圈之后，你就会发现有一种植物叫大树，你可以绕着树凭借不算风骚的走位，完虐狗和狼。靠着无限的小石头，屠夫硬生生被你丢石头砸死，每次3点血，蹲着12分钟轻松搞死！如果你有一个自动鼠标点击器，夫复何求！

目前只开放了3个“试炼”中的一个，感觉不错！很想看到Dave同学的下场！所有4个装备拿齐了，通过各种笔记还原了剧情的设定，各种武器搜集了，地图所有狗和狼和弓箭手和屠夫全躺下歇菜了。

坐等开发商公布后续内容，哪怕再花钱也愿意！

author: {'steamid': '76561198073710866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1531077286}
review: Ich würde einigen hier zustimmen, dass das Game einiges (nicht zuletzt die helle, farbenfrohe Optik) von FarCry hat. Das Spielkonzept eines "simplen" Survivalsystems mag ich persönlich sehr. Auch technisch bin ich für eine Alpha sehr überzeugt. Ich würde mir für die Zukunft noch mehr Items und ein abwechslungsreiches Innenleben der Locations wünschen, ansonsten aber sicher eine der besseren Indieproduktionen. Kann den Kauf für Actionfans nur empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198414335353', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1506008574}
review:
Devs took a big risk here,
trying to tell a deep, engaging and, above all, adult story presented with some innovative jump / climbing mechanics.
Fortunately they managed to pack a beautiful adventure for grown-ups.
It's not for casual gamers ( even if it's easier in Adventure mode, which i recommend ).
It's not for kids, either.

I'm mostly a console player so maybe i am not the right person to judge a PC game, but this is one of the most intriguing action / adventure experiences i've had the pleasure to play in recent years.

Now it's already quite good, 
and it can become a masterpiece.

recommended 8.8 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000611005', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1505067438}
review:
Review: Die Young - Hardcore-Survival-Game im Test! [PC]

Am 5. Juni 2017 veröffentlichte der Videospiel-Publisher und Entwickler IndieGala endlich sein Hardcore-Survival-Game DIE YOUNG, welches aktuell nur über Steam in der Early Access-Phase erhältlich ist. Doch kann das neue Survival-Game überzeugen? Finden wir es heraus und somit Willkommen im Test von DIE YOUNG!

Hier noch eine kleine Information! Das Spiel brauch einen Festplattenspeicher von 11,70GB und wurde in der 0.4.0.41.18 Version getestet. 

Story: Die Story ist zwar leicht klischeemäßig, kann aber trotzdem überzeugen. In DIE YOUNG spielen wir eine junge Frau, die von einer Party zur nächsten Party rusht, und Ihr Leben auf der Überholspur lebt. Plötzlich aber findet Sie sich auf einer geheimnisvollen Insel wieder und muss vor Ihrem unbekannten Entführer fliehen und einen Weg von der Insel finden. Dies wird aber kein Leichteres sein, auf dieser Insel befinden sich nämlich brutale Mörder, wilde Hunde und andere Gefahren. 

DIE YOUNG bietet am Anfang leider nur einen mageren Einstieg und das ganz ohne Tutorial, trotzdem haben wir alles was wir benötigen um zu überleben, und zwar unseren Instinkt. Am Anfang des Spiels finden wir eine Karte, wodrauf ein großer Turm markiert ist und weißt drauf hin, dass das unser Ziel ist, um von der Insel zu verschwinden. Wie Samara aus The Ring klettern wir also aus dem Brunnen am Anfang des Spiels und machen uns auf den Weg. 

Grafik: Die Grafik kann sehr überzeugen mit der Unreal Engine 4 und diverse Bugs konnten während des Testens auch nicht gefunden werden. Das Spiel bietet tolle Effekte und die Schauplätze können sehr überzeugen, so findet man auch alte Häuser mit vielen Informationen und ein sehr gut aussehendes Sonnenblumenfeld. Dies präsentiert Euch der Titel alles in der Egoperspektive. Die Modelle der anderen Charaktere bzw. der Leichen im Spiel, die wir finden können, könnten allerdings besser aussehen. Im Großen und Ganzen ist die Grafik als Open-World-Survival-Game sehr gut gelungen, hier also im Punkt "Grafik" haben die Entwickler schon einmal ganze Arbeit geleistet.

Gameplay: Der Titel ist ein reines Survival-Game, somit könnt Ihr also auch nichts aufbauen im Punkt "Craften". Hier könnt Ihr also nur das Nötigste zusammenbauen, um nicht jung zu sterben. Das Gameplay wurde sehr gut gehalten, auch wenn es manchmal schwierig wirkt, weil jeder Fehler das Ende sein könnte. Also seit immer auf der Hut, um nicht frühzeitig ins Gras zu beißen, weil davon bietet DIE YOUNG bestimmt auch 1000 Wege.

Ansonsten wirft einfach Steine, weil davon habt Ihr unendlich in der Tasche dabei. Die Tastenbelegung wurde sehr gut gewählt und das Spiel läuft sehr flüssig, kommt natürlich immer wiederum auf Euren Computer an. Im Punkt "Gameplay" haben die Entwickler ein klassisches Survival-Game erschaffen, welches gut überzeugen kann und nah am Realismus ist.

Sound: Hier im Punkt "Sound" bietet der Titel eine wirklich stimmungsvolle Soundkulisse, welche immer perfekt zum Spielgeschehen passt. Sprachausgaben gibt es leider keine und die Oberfläche wird auf Englisch, Russisch und Deutsch übermittelt. Auf der deutschen Oberfläche des Spiels kann es aber noch zu Übersetzungsfehlern kommen. Im Punkt "Sound" lässt sich leider nur wenig berichten, außer noch, dass die Musik im Hauptmenü mit ihrem klassischen Rocktitel einen perfekten Übergang einleitet.

Fazit: DIE YOUNG ist ein klassisches Survival-Game ohne den ganzen Aufbau-Schnickschnack. Der Titel kann voll und ganz überzeugen und der Tod verfolgt einem zu jederzeit. Als Open-World-Game ist die Größe der Insel genau richtig und es gibt viele Sachen zu erforschen. Leider bietet der Titel keinen Multiplayer-Modus, ansonsten habt Ihr das komplette Survival-Paket in einem Spiel. Und bis man die komplette Insel erkundet hat, hat man einen guten Zeitfresser gefunden. Der Early Access -Titel kann sehr guten überzeugen und der Kauf lohnt sich auch auf alle Fälle. Wir sind gespannt auf die nächsten kommenden Updates!

 
PUNKTE! 09/10 "THIS GAME IS VERY AWSOME!"

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198370066119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2150, 'last_played': 1546801023}
review:
(If you're interrested in more screenshots, there are quite a few under my profile.)

I have to say, especially for the price, this is a heck of a game, IMO. It's fairly unique and offers some beautiful scenery, a good storyline, interresting gameplay mechanics and all for an extremely low price. I bought the game on sale and actually feel bad about not paying full price, as it's already so cheap, for what you get. LOL. Not even kidding. There are full release games on STEAM, that are quite a bit more, that are no where near as good as Die Young, IMO. Basically, you are getting a near AAA game, for $15.

I read alot of reviews and read many of the negative reviews for this game and I have to say, people have a very difficuly time, in reflecting accurately, on what they are saying. Like the comparisons to the Island. IMO, this game is nothing like the Island and is far better. I have played the island for 3-4 hours. It just doesn't hold my interrest. It's too generic, not well thought out or implented. The gameplay is boring and offers nothing new. It is simply another survival clone, IMO. Where as, Die Young is pretty unique in many aspects, well thought out and very nicely implemented, into gameplay. Beautiful GFX/scenery, original local, original concept, some original aspects of gameplay, great tension, all wrapped together in a nice, neat, little package. IMO, this game does everything well.

The controls are tight. The play area is already pretty big and they are adding more. The crafting is easy and intuitive. The weapons feel like something you should have, in a game like this and the breaking mechanic helps add to the over all tension. The jumping/climbing aspects are not puzzles, IMO, as they offer clearly marked paths of accension. There is no guessing where you need to go, as there would be in a puzzle. You do have to pay attention to stamina, but that just adds realism. IRL, you can't just dangle some where forever. Combat is straight forward and functions well. Dogs are actually VERY easy to kill. Probably a little too easy, IMO. Just a matter of using your brain to figure it out.

 
 Some people put down the jumping/climbing aspect, of this game. When you consider the protagonists background, extreme sport/adrenaline junky, it fits in perfectly. The people complaining about it, have very little time in the game, which means they didn't take any time to learn the basic mechanics and must rage quit very easily. The jumping/climbing adds some nice challenge, as well as some nice tension. In all honesty, there are only a couple of jumps that I did not make the first time. However, the way that saving is implemented, you simply craft a fire, before a long jump and save, so if you miss, your right at the jump, to try again.

The developers are on top of it too. They add new content regularly, communicate with the community regularly, get patches and fixes out in a timely fashion and are very professional. If all devs were like these people, the gaming industry would be a totally different animal, than what it is today.

This is EASILY one of the absolute best bargains on STEAM and without a doubt, hands down, one of the best games on STEAM, not just in EA. I have decades of gaming experince and this game, this game is special, unique and will be played through many times, by myself. 

Would I buy the game again, if I had it to do over? ABSOLUTELY, only I would have paid full price, instead of getting it on sale. Why? Because these are the type of developers that you want to support and see grow. They still have plenty of ideas to implement, into the game and I already know that, when it is done, it will be as close to being a AAA title, as a game can be, without getting the rating. In my mind, I basically got a AAA title, for less than $15. Not a bad deal in my book.

Do yourself a favor and give the game a chance. I think you will be surprised, by how good it really is. I know I will actually be buying several more copies, to give out as Xmas gifts. I hope you ignore some of these reviews, just on the grounds of inaccuracies and just go with your gut. If it looks like a game that you would like, punch that ticket and take it home.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979772579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1359, 'last_played': 1598050042}
review:
This game is alot of fun, first off weapons arent best and enemies like dogs are difficult to kill. Dogs are everywhere which forces you to do some sneaking. Theirs alot of platform jumping in this game, which at times can be anoying. However it add that thrill of almost not making it, but still pulling it off. gaphics and performance is pretty good, their is some bugs and loading lag. But in genral performs nice, ive played this on both a laptop gtx960m and a desktop gtx1080. The laptop gets a pretty smooth 30fps on median. while 60fps on a gtx1080 and both have loading lag. A real great quality of this game is the devloper is around to answer and help with support. I had found a bug, and the devloper answered and fixed it with in a day so.

I really enjoy playing this game and would recommend it to anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974765747', 'num_games_owned': 868, 'num_reviews': 362, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1611076306}
review:
Frustratingly challenging survival game. It took a non survival guru like myself some time to get used to the game but now I can say I am fairly happy with it. The game play is mostly easy to figure out and the graphics are pretty decent. For a casual gamer like myself it is "hard". I suppose I need to manage my time,hunger, and energy use better in the game. There is jumping, climbing, discovery, clue collecting, questing, baddies, hostile animals, running, fighting, drinking, eating and stealth. My recommendation is if you buy this follow the quest suggestions at the start at least in your first run through. Searching and exploring will get you what you need and where you need to go most of the time. This has an adventure and hardcore mode so everyone should be pleased. This is not my normal likable genre but I enjoyed this one after I got used to surviving. Well worth a buy in my opinion. My number rating for this would be a 7/10 for this build. 

4k video here of my first play. I was frustrated at first but my sentiment is I'm going back for more punishment. Enjoy. ;-)

https://youtu.be/NulPb-HXzbQ

author: {'steamid': '76561197968121414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1610031543}
review: I know this game is still in development and for most part I'm enjoying it. BUT it still feels incredibly unbalanced the whole concept of save locations rather than just being able to save the game is really offputting meaning if I've invested a while and then suddenly die because a dog appears around the corner and my weapon of a stick or small stones just arent enough I lose all of my progress so will just turn the game off. You can't even punch or kick so when your stick snaps you're defensless! Controls are also a bit dodgy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045296582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1504334967}
review:
I would love to give this game a positive review I really would. But I'm so furious with the climbing and parkour style travel that I just can't justify giving this a positive review. The theme, the world, and even the threat of dying of thirst or lack of resources is a great idea. Sadly the platforming and maneurvering is garbage. I can't tell you how many times I've died to simple jumps I've made before or my character just gave up on life and let go of a ledge as soon as I grabbed it and decided to end her life. It's like the character has a mind of her own and is suicidal and downright moronic when it comes to making jumps or grabbing ledges. Honestly debating getting a refund just because of the broken parkour.

EDIT: Instead of a refund I recieved a troll harassing my review. Good times.

I would also like to clarify, this is only indicative of MY experience (as should be obvious). This isn't meant to be harmful or rude towards the devs, but I feel the parkour could use some fine tuning to make it a little more reliable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023286742', 'num_games_owned': 1463, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 2252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2138, 'last_played': 1572083454}
review:
Hry s predbežným prístupom nikdy nekupujem ale po vzhliadnutí videa na yuotube som neodolal a kúpil som Die young.Odohral som pár desiatok hodín a našiel takmer všetko čo hra momentálne može ukázať tak sem hodím svoje postrehy.

Hra sa prezentuje ako survival ale popravde prežívanie je skor taký vedľajší produkt.Ano,budete jesť a piť,vyrábať nástroje a mixovať byliny podľa nájdených receptov ale zatiaľ je to ozaj tak v alfa verzii lebo napríklad je dosť divné spadnúť z výšky a fyzické zranenie si doplniť jedlom z konzervy.
Čo budete ale hodne robiť je behanie,skákanie a lezenie po skalách.Táto činnosť je asi tak 80%.Zbytok je hľadanie vecí na splnenie questov.

Teraz niečo k hre:
*********************
Beží tu reálny čas čo znamená,že sekundy sú naozaj sekundy a minuty naozaj minuty.Jediné kedy čas ubehne rýchlejšie je spánok.Na to sú kamenné svatyne,ktoré okrem spánku aj skracujú vzdialenosti jednotlivých lokácií aby ste nemuseli behať kilometre zbytočne.Samozrejme ich najprv musíte nájsť inak budete tie kilometre vážne behať /pravdou je,že ich budete behať aj tak :D / a navyše v noci sa nedajú robiť savy čo je v podstate istá smrť.

Savy:
******
Využívajú nájdené ohniská ale dá sa aj používať aj jedno drevo,ktoré sa všade doslova váľa takže po nájdení receptu to treba využívať hlavne pri lezení na vysoké bralá.

Inventár:
**********
Je na začiatku malý ale dajú sa nájsť nejaké batohy a tie ho rozšíria.Tak isto sa rozšíri aj množstvo nesených bylín z 1 až na miximálnych 9 kusov z každého druhu.
Čo je dosť nezmyselné je hľadanie oblečenia na postavu.Hlavná hrdinka má svoje vlastné oblečenie ale možno nájsť pár vecí,ktoré by mali akože vylepšiť fyzické vlastnosti postavy ale zatiaľ to nefunguje asi tak ako autori zamýšľali resp.jediné rukavice majú efekt,že sa udržíte dlhšie na skalách.Tenisky na beh sú slabé,čiapka proti slnku tiež a nohavice ani neviem načo majú akože byť.

Nepriatelia:
*************
Tu je to bieda.Okrem hadov,krýs a psov na ostrove nie je nič iné.A samozrejme pár magorov s kosou a kušou.Zabíjať hadov je dokonca vyložene škoda lebo neskor v hre získate venom tools a potom sa z nich dá odoberať jed na zabíjanie psov.Sranda na tom je,že kým túto vec získate tak hadov vyzabíjate a skoro aj psov :D

Grafika a hudba:
******************
Tu klobúk dole.Tieto dve veci urobili z tejto gamesy nádhernú podívanú a soundtrack hoci sa opakuje je fajn to počúvať.

Bugy:
******
Je ich dosť ale autori ich raz za týždeň resp.dva opravujú.Mne najviac vadil bug s teniskou,lebo po nájdení prvej a následne o kus ďalej druhej sa zobrazila len jedna na nohe a tým pádom moja postava behala vizuálne bosá.Na to si treba dať pozor a radšej dať load.

Celkové hodnotenie:
***********************
Hra je výborná aj keď autori sú špekulanti a vobec sa v súčasnom stave nedá dohrať.Dokonca aj quest s nájdením 5 svojich priateľov je nemožné urobiť/nájdete maximálne 3 ostatní v hre zatiaľ nie sú/ 
Momentálne ju hodnotím 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197974106428', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 1273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 813, 'last_played': 1594053876}
review:
Parcour und Survival Game. Spring- und Klettereinlagen erinnerten mich an Mirror's Edge, die alten Tomb Raider und ein wenig an Uncharted. Der Survival Part beschränkt sich auf das Craften von Werkzeugen und das Sammeln von Ressourcen und Nahrung. Es gibt keine Möglichkeit Häuser zu bauen wie in anderen Survival Spielen. Und Die Young ist ein reines Singleplayer Spiel.
Das Ganze ist verpackt in eine mysteriöse Story, die konträr zu der wundervollen und sonnigen Umgebung kaum düsterer sein könnte. Großartige Mischung!

Bugs sind mir bereits ein paar begegnet, aber nichts schlimmes. Performance ist jedoch verbesserungswürdig. Ich konnte das Game zwar mit 60FPS auf Medium zocken (in dem es immer noch wunderbar ausschaut), allerdings mit häufig auftretenden und deutlich spürbaren FPS Dips, die sich offenbar aktuell nicht vermeiden lassen. Allerdings traten die hauptsächlich nur beim Hechten und Wetzen über das Land auf. In den Gebäuden und Höhlen hatte ich diese Probleme nicht. 

[edit] Konnte die FPS Dips stark verringern, indem ich die Grafik Voreinstellungen allgemein auf Low stellte und darauf hin einige Einzeloptionen wieder auf Medium rangierte, von denen ich wusste, dass sie normalerweise von meinem System gestemmt werden können. Eventuell gehen manche Einzeloptionen sogar auf High, habe ich aber nicht versucht. Bin soweit trotzdem mit der Optik noch zufrienden, Optimierungsbedarf seitens der Entwickler sehe ich aber weiterhin. Habe eine GTX960 Grafikkarte, welche zwar nicht das Beste ist, aber auch nicht das Schlechteste. An meinen anderen PC-Teilen kann es nicht liegen, die tauchen ne Menge.[/edit] 

Trotz Early Access ist das Game schon erstaunlich umfassend und die Areale sehr weitläufig. Es gibt so viel zu entdecken! 
Macht echt viel Spaß. Und das Preis/Leistung Verhältnis erscheint mir aktuell extrem gut.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006582109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 4117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2504, 'last_played': 1578778850}
review:
До релиза брать не рекомендую, потому что до сих пор совершенно не понятно, чем игра станет в итоге.
Сначала это была классная выживалка с открытым миром, кучей противников и загадок а-ля The Forrest, но еще и с интересно сделанным скалолазанием.
После обновления были добавлены новые локации, с которыми игра превратилась в коридорный, абсолютно линейный забег от собак и волков по камням.
С еще одним обновлением (и новыми локациями) она превратилась в скучный и унылый лабиринт в горах с совершенно дикими прыжковыми упражнениями, от которых начинает бомбить уже через пару минут.
От атмосферы и геймплея, которые были на старте, не осталось и следа.
Не исключено, что через пару обновлений игра превратится в шутер, а еще через несколько - просто улетит в космос.

Действительно отличный в этой игре только первый час (когда действие происходит действительно в открытом игровом мире). После интересные идеи заканчиваются, а геймплей остается.

5 спятивших турецких социалистов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197994475018', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1504015414}
review:
I would give it an Thumbs down
Not because the game is bad, but because it is marketed as survival game, in truth it is an climbing simulator.

While the beginning is fun where you climb and jump to reach places as if sneaking into them where you should not it turns into an mega jumpa an climbalon later.

Sell it as hardcore climbing Free climbing simulator.

Do not confuse people with wrong titles and genre branding.

It is not nice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052380704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 827, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 599, 'last_played': 1516928218}
review:
WARNING - JUMPING PUZZLES! This game is a jumping puzzle game. It's mismarketed. It's a survival game only in the sense that you need to pick flowers to heal and drink water occasionaly. In terms of how you "progress" it's like Prince of Persia (jumping) or Mirror's Edge (the bad parts). It's not scary, at least not in my time playing, and my agency was rutinely taken away to complete jumping puzzles. 

To clarify: The term "jumping puzzle" means - a series of player inputs that suspend player agency and usually involve jumping. 
In other words they're jumping mazes with one correct solution. They aren't neccessarily (or usually even) hard at all. You just jump, look around, jump, look around and so on. 

The jumping puzzles are canyoned. They're long enough to need check points. For example, half way up a building a box will fall that allows you to more quickly access the area you just jumped to. There's no thinking or problem solving involved in the jumping puzzles (at least not as far in as I got before quitting). You just look for the next place the devs want you to jump.

You get to make some survival sandbox decisions BETWEEN jumping puzzles, like what order you should do them in. These sandbox mechanics accounted for about one half of my time in-game. 

If you haven't played a game with "jumping puzzles", allow me to warn you that, for me at least,  they tend to break any suspension of disbelief that you may develope from other, better, survival games. The "island community" appearse to have gone through a lot of trouble to make a parkour park, even taking the time to paint reachable areas white and tie red cloths to interatable wall hand holds (ALL of them - lol). 

This game IS shockinly well made for what it is. It looks and sounds good. If canyoned jumping puzzles are your thing, you'll probably love this. Generally, canyoned jumping puzzles have been made by really bad teams of devs. This is a canyoned jumping puzzle made by a good team. It's unique and strange in that way. 

On record I show more time than I actually played, since I walked away and left the game on in menu. Wish I hadn't cause I'd get a refund if I could. Sad that I didn't realize what this game is when I bought it. 

To the devs - please abandon the jumping puzzles entirely and you may have something here. They are outdated. IF you must include them because of some nostalgia for old bad games, please at least make them optional routes to non-vital content. Parkuor movement in a survival game is GREAT, little pieces of metal with flags tied to them from the 90's that I MUST interact with is a deal breaker for me.  

Finally, after playing this for about two hours, I have to say I cannot imagine this style will ever gain traction for this fundametal reason - survival games cannot be canyoned and still feel cohesive. They have to feel "real" with real consequences and rational atmosphere (like who the hell tied red scarves to all these pieces of metal?). Jumping puzzles have never and will never feel "real" since they have never BEEN and will never BE REAL.  I don't think this version of this game will ever really hit a wide demographic. How many fans of Prince of Persia enjoyed "The Forest" and thought, "this needs more jumping puzzles"? I'll be shocked if it's very many.

"The Forest" is a great example of a game that has tastefully integrated climbing elements. They feel relatively natural and logical, they are short and interspersed with decision making. I'm not a fanboy (well maybe a bit - it's a good game) just pointing out an illustration of what I mean and trying to help point people to content they'll enjoy.  

**I've edited this review after calming down to be more helpful and less spiteful. I'm just trying to write what I wish I'd been able to read before buying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198254487722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1509566429}
review:
Summary - Die Young, is a 1st person, singerplayer, open world survival game much like, The Forest or even Rust, you play as a girl who has been kidnapped mysteriously and left on an island in the Mediterranean Sea filled with various different animals and even a huge guy with an axe. You have the ability to play a survival game or follow the short story in order to escape the island

Pros

- Good graphics, mainly focusing on the close ups, the game on max is very pretty 
- Can play both survival and story mode
- Unique enemies, the game has huge rats, dogs and like I said, a huge guy with axe that comes and random points in the map and chases you

Cons 

- Parkour/movement mechanics is what let this game down for me, your character dies from taking the smallest amount of fall damage, overall the movement was not smooth at all
- Copies too many aspects from The Forest
- Far away visials are terrible, like honestly did they put any effort in to them at all?
- The stamina aspect is very annoying 
- Weapons don't last aslong as they should 

Verdict: Overall, Die Young, is not a game I can recommend at it's current state, the game is still in Early Access and I think the game does have potenial to become something good

author: {'steamid': '76561198048785535', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1651383808}

author: {'steamid': '76561198139510093', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 1680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1626982943}
review:
RECENSIONE AGGIORNATA ALLA VERSIONE COMPLETA

É un survival in prima persona ambientato su un'isola bella assolata.
tu sei un'esperta scalatrice, e dovrai ricorrere alle doti di , appunto, scalatrice per esplorare i vari luoghi chiave dell'isola e trovare i tuoi amici.
interfaccia semplice, inventario come al solito un po' striminzito.
il tuo nemico è la natura , qualche animale, e...
è un gioco che non ti tiene per mano.

Ha alcuni punti in comune con Zelda Breath Of The Wild: l'isola è molto ma MOLTO più grande di quanto non sembri durante le prime ore di gioco, tutte le armi durano relativamente poco (a parte la balestra) e alcune fanno anche da oggetti chiave necessarie per aprire porte e completare obiettivi secondari. É sì un openworld, ma al tempo stesso non è un ammasso di icone spiattellate su una mappa: anzi, la cartina è piuttosto scomoda DI PROPOSITO e richiede una lettura attenta, quindi per molte cose dovrai fare affidamento sulla tua vista e una bussola. Ci sono un sacco di cose da fare e spesso richiedono di vagare per l'isola alla ricerca di quell'oggetto chiave necessario a completare l'obiettivo. Insomma, potremmo dire che [u]questo gioco è una continua scoperta[/u]. Sotto questo aspetto è più simile a Resident Evil 1-2-3 che non a Assassin's Creed, dal momento che la "missione" (se possiamo chiamarla così) ti verrà assegnata solo dopo che ti sei preso la briga di leggere determinati documenti o acquisito certi oggetti.

L'aspetto survival è piuttosto classico: avrai inventario e stamina limitati che puoi comunque migliorare trovando oggetti ben nascosti, sarai sempre spinto ad esplorare e cercare risorse per migliorarti o mettere da parte per fabbricare l'attrezzo giusto al momento giusto, e all'inizio della partita puoi scegliere se utilizzare i salvataggi automatici o rischiare il tutto per tutto e ricorrere ai salvataggi manuali.

C'è del parkour, nel senso che capiterà spesso di trovarsi tracciati segnati in un modo piuttosto visibile percorribili con salti preceduti da una certa rincorsa. Sono divertenti a 
 loro modo, non ai livelli di Mirror's Edge ma ehi non mi lamento. Teneteli d'occhio perché spesso indicano la presenza di percorsi alternativi e zone nascoste con molte cose utili.

L'aspetto narrativo non è molto curato, ma non lo chiamerei un difetto.
Ha più finali, se vi interessa.

Parlando di difetti veri e propri, è sempre giorno (XD) , il menu dei documenti un tantino scomodo e c'è uno strano bug che rende il personaggio incontrollabile se scivolate a seguito di una caduta considerevole, ma a parte queste due cose [b]lo consiglio con ogni fibra che ho in corpo.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198072699293', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1503488757}
review:
Die Young is probably the best game in Early Access state that i have played.

It's still in Alpha so yeah, it has its flaws and bugs, but they don't outweight the quality of the game and i trust that the developers will iron out all those issues with time. They have already put out a big content update with some hours of story.

This game is very similar to Dying Light in a way, so if you liked it, you will most definitely like Die Young!

The graphics are beautiful, and so are the environments! Some of the best looking indie games out there.

Also, you will die... like a lot...

8/10 : Too much parkour
