author: {'steamid': '76561197970361504', 'num_games_owned': 1723, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2736, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1571121532}
review:
Vorweg: Ich habe die Early Access Version durchgespielt.

Survival Spiele gibt es ja wie Sand am Meer und ich bin zugegeben nicht gerade ein Freund davon.
Dieses hier ist aber ein richtiges Kleinod, dass ich gar nicht auf dem Radar hatte.

Dieses Spiel macht verdammt viel Spaß. 
Zumindest, wenn man auf Spiele wie Mirrors Edge und Tomb Raider steht.
Man kann und muss viel klettern, was sehr gut funktioniert, hatte maximal 1-2 mal einen verpatzen Sprung, für den ich nichts konnte.
Man kann anfangs wenige Materialien tragen, macht aber auch Sinn. Stupides mit Fäusten auf Bäume und Steine hauen gibt es nicht. Das Crafting beschränkt sich auf wenige, wichtige Dinge wie Heilsalbe, Kompressen gegen Gift und Blutungen, Werkzeuge, etc.
Ausrüstung ist rar und wenn man nach einer sehr spaßigen Kletterei eine Hose mit Knieschoner findet, mit der man weniger Fallschaden bekommt, dann motiviert das ungemein.

Die Grafik ist durchaus schön, aber die Aussage ist relativ, muss jeder selbst entscheiden. Die Unreal Engine 4 macht auf jeden Fall einen guten Job.
Der Sound hat leider ein paar Probleme, bei mir z.B. kam öfter das Zischen einer Schlange, obwohl keine in der Nähe war.
Die Steuerung mit Maus und Tastatur funktioniert super und sollte man mal sterben, dann gibt es faire Rücksetzpunkte. Nichts mit 10 Minuten nackt zur Leiche laufen.
Die Story wird durch wenige NPCs und viele Texte erzählt, die in der Welt verteilt liegen. Gefällt und regt zum Nachdenken an. Hier will ich nicht zu viel verraten, so viel zum interpretieren gibt es nicht.

Wer sich gerne einen Einblick verschaffen will, der kann in meine Playlist schauen:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8d_nDt2vvuI&list=PLNO4FREMyM4cqndQbjLNzgxuDSb21To1E

author: {'steamid': '76561198019923479', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 2212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 553, 'last_played': 1591495577}
review:
Die young is a survival exploration game with parkour elements. It's surprisingly well optimized for a newly released alpha and I had a lot of fun playing it. 

The good things:
1. An excellent parkour system with great environment that makes the game fun and sometimes challenging.
2. An interesting setting with a story that gets deeper as you explore and learn more.
3. Great soundtrack. (Music and in-game sounds)
4. Challenging enemies that are not too powerful but charging them head-on is not ideal (which so many have tried and failed).
5. Awesome in-game world with secrets to discover and beautiful picturesce environment.
6. A lot of game for the price.
7. Updates are coming.

The bad things:
1. Early alpha, so you will complete what's out so far in 10 hours.
2. Annoying and LOUD wheezing sound constantly playing in the background which breaks immersion (Hope it will be fixed soon).
3. Minor alpha bugs.
4. To be perfectly honest, the voice acting is so-so. Some good, and some a bit stale and monotone (Not horrible, but not great).

This is the most fun parkour run and hide game I have ever played, highly recommended.

Ps. Steam is too sensitive when "shit" is hearted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078236575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1581556167}
review:
Eu tentei. Juro que tentei terminar esse jogo. Mas o jogo me venceu pelo cansaço. A história é até legalzinha e te prende até certo ponto, mesmo não tendo tradução pt-br em meio a um monte de textos. Porém há bugs. Muitos bugs. A IA do jogo é extremamente burra e você só morre se for por bugs ou quedas.

O sistema de craft é até legal e intuitivo. E só.

O vai e vem de missões se tornou muito cansativo pra mim e o parkour está anos luz de ser agradável como no DL.

Cansativo é uma boa definição pra esse game.

Não acho que valeu a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119606037', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1496870156}
review:
I first found out about this game through the trailer on YouTube. In the video, it looked like a beautiful game with decent voice acting and an intriguing plot that would guide you through a memorable adventure.

TL;DR: If you have standards and any inkling of expectations as to what an adventure/survival/open-world game should be like, don't be fooled by all these positive reviews and think twice about the purchase you're about to make.

Unfortunately, I was immediately disappointed. Provided backstory is minimal and feels thrown together with lacking effort, so the character you play is all but a stranger - and an unnecessarily loud one at that, but I'll get to that point in a moment. I was expecting to delve immediately into a storyline that is well put together with depth and excitement. The lack of explanation in this game as to what's going on isn't mystery; it's poor story and game design. Aside from a few mysterious, poorly written (think back to that creative writing class you took freshman year of high school) notes lying around, like the kind you'll stumble across in many dated mediocre adventure games, there isn't any sort of information to find that drives me to continue trying to piece it together.
I have a high-end gaming laptop, and while the game ran very well with no lag, that's probably because the game's graphics, even on "EPIC" settings, are sub-par. In 2017, gamers can expect so much more than choppy graphics, 2D effects, and low quality audio set on repeat. I did everything I could to figure out why my game looked like it did before I realized that that's just the way the graphics were made.
Since I mentioned audio, let's talk about the main character's voice. In the intro I gave the voice acting a solid B+. Compared to many games, it was pretty good. But after the intro, the game developers seem to have stopped putting acceptable effort into any sort of voicing. For as much noise as this woman makes whenever she runs or jumps or climbs and moans and gasps and groans any time she needs to use muscles above her thighs, there is little to appreciate in terms of her voiced input. Sometimes when she observes things, she has (somewhat) useful observations, but they aren't voiced. Half of this game uses only subtitles, even when the voice actor had seemed so fitting! What?
The AI in this game is probably the most disappointing part. Remember those early PS2 games where enemies monotonously patrolled a single path without a single change in their gate, or where they were set to wander randomly throughout a small area? That's the level of innovation applied to Die Young's AI. Stand on a boulder and you can watch dogs and rats and comically bulky men wander aimlessly in their small area, forever stuck in the same animation and never stopping to look around or do something vaguely interesting. There is no search mechanic for the enemies; as soon as you pass the invisible wall that keeps them in one area, they give up and run back to their patrol. Did I get transported back into 2004?

I can see what this game is trying to achieve, and I acknowledge that it is still a pre-alpha release, but Die Young was advertised as so much more - so much better - than what it currently is. I am still curious about the story and will continue to follow the game's new content and updates, but I will do so skeptically. Currently, I regret paying $15 for a game that is actually worth at MOST about eight bucks. Even then, I would probably still ask for my money back.

Speaking of... can I get a refund?

author: {'steamid': '76561198148759274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1496869587}

author: {'steamid': '76561198002989457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1544550167}
review:
Ноуп. Пока не могу рекомендовать. Игра выйдет через пару дней(по крайней мере, релиз в стиме, версия игры же - 0.2.5.чего-то-там), посмотрим, что изменится.

А на данный момент:
Настроить чувствительность мыши нельзя.
ГГ управления вроде и слушается, но динамика движений неясна: вот вроде бежишь, и понимаешь, что допрыгнешь, и схватишься за уступ... а нифига - ГГ берёт, и падает.

Падения, это нечто. Игра с "паркуром", где умираешь при падении с высоты больше одного метра(даже я с высоты двух метров максимум подвернул лодыжку, а наша ГГ, которая любит лазить и бегать, судя по предыстории, умирает прям совсем).
Падаешь метр-полтора. Умираешь. Загружается последний сейв у костра. Долго бежишь туда, где был. Снова падаешь, умираешь. Опять бежишь. Падаешь, умираешь. Попытки с 5-й только ГГ наконец-то допрыгивает туда, куда было надо.

Ну и напоследок словил какой-то глюк камеры, когда она перестала реагировать на мышь, и лишь скользила в разные стороны при движении персонажа.

Этого с меня хватило, падения там, где ГГ наверняка должна была схватиться за выступ, и смерть от падения с 1.5 метров - это перебор, остальные аспекты игры я оценить даже не могу, слишком раздражающе.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052336290', 'num_games_owned': 4872, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1574796770}
review:
Die Young,co na to říct?Hráli jste Dark souls?Pokud ano,tak jednu věc mají společnou a to že budete neustále pod tlakem ve stresu a pořád umírat každá chyba vás tu ve většině případů bude stát život.
Např:vás zakousne pes,nebo uškne had a pokud si to rychle nevyléčíte jste tuhý a nebo vás chytí ten psychopat s kosou či co to má v ruce a jste taky.Ve hře je spousta hádanek jak se kam dostat vyskákat a nespadnout při tom nebo nebýt spatřen taky musíte najít všechny své přátele se kterýma jste na ostrov dojeli lodí malí spoil myslím si že jsou všeci pod kytkama už jsem jich pár našel není to pěkny pohled a taky vás tu trápí žízeň na kterou taky umřete nějaké zbraně se tu také najdou.Je tu i craft system věcí pro přežití musím podotknout že hra je v ranné Alfě takže ještě je co zlepšovat,ale za tech 13,50€ co jsem za to dal je to dobrá koupě.
Plusy:Celkem pěkná grafika,Cena,Hratelnost,Atmosféra všudy přítomné možnosti smrti a to i přes to že hrajete za bíleho dne.
Mínusy:zatím se na větší bugy nenarazil a to je to alfa snad to do budoucna nepokazí jinak nevím co vytknout.
Vývojáři zatím každy den dávají update což je dobře hra muže byt časem i velkým titulem.
za mě verdik Ano
Update :hra po přechodu na verzi 1.0 se vyrazně zjednodušila čož se mě osobně nelíbí,voda už vás tolik netrápí ani psi už nejsou taková výzva... za mě trochu zklamání jinak hra vypadá skvěle

author: {'steamid': '76561198065055371', 'num_games_owned': 2918, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1667725271}
review:
[h1]Materiał wideo:[/h1] https://youtu.be/VOQcNYUkYWQ
Gdybym miał możliwie najkrócej opisać tę grę, powiedziałbym, że to połączenie [b]The Forest[/b], [b]Dying Light[/b] i mniejszych horrorów indie jak [b]Eleusis[/b].
Fabularnego majstersztyku tu nie uświadczycie, ale gameplay jest nader przyjemny, wciąga i ma mnóstwo rozmaitych mechanizmów. Przez eksplorację, crafting, walkę aż po parkour, zrealizowany w dość podobny sposób do tego ze wspomnianego wcześniej rodzimego [i]Dying Light[/i]. Doznacie nieopisanej frajdy dostając w swoje ręce otwarty świat i masę questów pobocznych, które pomogą w ustaleniu gdzie jesteśmy, co się stało i wiele innych ciekawych tajemnic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059586707', 'num_games_owned': 188, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 880, 'last_played': 1574361663}
review: Хоть игра и в раннем доступе, она выглядит неплохо. Хорошая графика и достаточно интересный сюжет, не особо дорогая цена. Так как, это ранний доступ присутствуют некоторые баги. Нужно поработать над ИИ врагов, улучшить паркур. Игра очень понравилась, при дальнейшем должном её развитии она имеет все шансы на успех. Если вам нравятся игры такого рода, то берите обязательно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011407786', 'num_games_owned': 463, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1496992412}

author: {'steamid': '76561198069479697', 'num_games_owned': 653, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1496756332}
review:
孤岛惊魂+古墓丽影+森林+被老鼠咬死+被野人砍死+摔死+累了被搞死+渴死

author: {'steamid': '76561197979312545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1510097717}
review:
Bonjour à tous !

Bon, on va faire court, le jeu me plaît voilà !
Pour une alpha, c'est franchement propre et j'aime beaucoup l'idée de mélanger l'horreur au paradisiaque, un peu comme un Dead Island premier du nom.
Le jeu emprunte pas mal de choses aux jeux de survie car là, nous ne sommes pas dans une fuite en avant comme dans un Outlast 2 mais bel et bien dans un jeu où l'on va devoir intéragir avec notre environnement régulièrement pour pouvoir subsister et continuer d'explorer la carte de l'île et apprendre ce qui s'est passé !

Les + et les - :

+ La possibilité d'aller n'importe où.
+ Le fait que notre personnage sâche réellement ce que c'est de courir !!! (Pas comme dans RE7 ou Outlast)
+ Une jauge d'hydratation qui tient longtemps !
+ La possibilité de crafter des choses simples et en faible quantité (faut rester réaliste, on ne peut pas transporter 40 bandages, 30 morceaux de bois, 50 plantes dans notre mini-short !)
+ L'aspect global de l'île. Faut dire ce qui est, c'est beau !
+ Notre héroïne n'est pas une chochotte !

- L'escalade un peu hasardeuse qui peut être fatale juste parcequ'on est pas positionné exactement où le jeu veut que nous soyons (Je pense que ce sera corrigé).
- Quelques bugs concernant le bourreau qui donne l'impression par moment de se déplacer sur des rails (lorsqu'il est eu loin).
- Se faire attaquer par des rats (en duo). Sérieusement ? Ne pas être capable de les aplatir avec la première pierre venue, franchement...
- Se faire attaquer par un serpent passe encore, mais qu'il se lance à votre poursuite sur 500m, là faut pas déconner ^^

Je suis très très impatient d'en connaître plus sur l'histoire même si j'ai l'impression qu'on s'oriente vers un scénario à la "The Game" avec Michael Douglas. Des riches qui ont tout et ne vivent que pour le frisson et l'adrénaline (C'est dans l'intro du jeu). Je vous fiche mon billet que notre personnage participe contre son gré à un jeu mortel organisé par des gens de son milieu histoire de tromper l'ennui ! (On verra si je me trompe^^)

So vous voulez voir les premières 30 minutes de jeu, elles sont disponibles sur ma chaine : [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=goyBlx1Vp3U&t=85s]NicovsEvil - Die Young[/url]

Bon jeu à tous !

author: {'steamid': '76561198029080621', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1589036026}
review:
This game features a lot of parkour with focus in survival since your main goal is not to Die Young in an island off the coast of Turkey.

The parkour is well implemented and its mechanics are fluid. The exploration of the island is also another aspect in which this game shines. In the areas available to explore theres a lot to do and explore, like finding resources and other stuff needed to craft items and along the way you find new quests to explore sites among other things. 

As for the story so far the setting is interesting. You play as a girl who was kidnapped and buried alive in a well and her main objective is now to get out of the island while trying to find her friends.

Since this is an early access version the story hasnt progress too far yet so at this point you only get a glimpse of what it will be.

As for the graphics this game is gorgeous, it only has a few texture issues but so far has been a fluid and enjoyable experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988707780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1203, 'last_played': 1536148399}
review:
Avis basé sur l'accès anticipé en juin 2017 : Je tiens avant tout a dire que ce jeu est très propre pour un accès anticipé, et je n'ai quasiment rencontré aucun bug.
Des parties de l'ile sont cependant bloquées par des grillages, il y a actuellement 5km² de l'ile faites et 25 quêtes pour environ 14 heures de jeu si on utilise pas de solution.La version final devrait proposer l'ile complète de 12km² et 75 quêtes.

Ce jeu est un excellent melting pot des genres.

    De la survie avec gestion de la soif et un peu de crafting.
    De l'exploration avec de la plateforme a la tomb raider...
    ...mais qui fait sacrement penser a mirror edge a cause de la vue première personne et des animations de gameplay.
    Une dose d'infiltration, pour ne pas se faire repérer on pourra se cacher dans les hautes herbes, si par contre on tombe sur des oiseaux que l'on fait s'envoler on risque plus facilement de se faire repérer.
    On peu aussi combattre les ennemis avec des armes de corps a corps.
    Des énigmes a résoudre comme empoisonner un chien pour prendre la clef qui était près de lui ou trouver une clef a molette pour réparer une pompe a eau etc...

Le personnage n’évolue pas et ne débloque pas de compétence, c'est en trouvant de l’équipement qu'on améliorera nos capacités, ceinture pour l'inventaire, chaussure pour améliorer la course, casquette ralentissant légèrement la déshydratation etc...

Ce n'est pas vraiment un sandbox, mais bien une histoire scénarisé avec un journal de quête. On trouvera aussi des notes venant enrichir l'immersion.

On ne peu sauvegarder qu'a des endroit définit par des feux de camps, certains passages de plateformes sont ardus et tomber entrainera la mort facilement surtout au début, il y a donc un petit coté die and retry parfois qui s'atténue au bout de quelques heures de jeu quand on maitrise mieux notre personnage.
Généralement après avoir passer un passage difficile on fait tomber une caisse, on ouvre une porte ou bien encore un arbre pour avoir accès a la zone sans refaire le parcours.

+ Graphismes
+ Histoire glauque et bonne ambiance.
+ Aspect survie qui apporte un plus sans être extrême, on boit pas toute les 5 minutes.
+ On a l'impression de faire des parcours de l’extrême sur la partie plateforme.
+ Sonorement très immersif.
+ Qualité prix!
+ Cycle du jour très lent 1h RL pour 1h dans le jeu c'est très plaisant...

- ...mais pas de nuit, il faudra trouvé un endroit pour dormir avant 21h
- Combat assez simple pour le moment, des armes de corps a corps uniquement.
- IA basique qui semble suivre des chemins bien définit.
- Pas de texte en français (et pas prévu pour le moment d'après les développeurs.)

Ce jeu est une excellente surprise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051699025', 'num_games_owned': 512, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1623829771}
review:
[h1]Gameplay Video:[/h1]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uMotkpPsUVM] Die Young - Gameplay Part 1 [/url]

Die Young is an open world game with a very big and vast map that you can explore. But not with your ordinary exploring, you can explore it by doing parkour on the roofs and climbing mountains. But be careful tho, since you could get a lot of damage if you fall from high places, so you should be cautious at all times.

Since the game is still in early access, there could be a lot of bugs. Tho I didn't encounter any of them, I only experienced a game crash at the near end of the video thats why I couldnt say my closing remarks. But so far so good. Tho it would be great in the future if they could optimize the game a bit more since theres some noticeable fps drops in some areas. Tho my GPU passes only the minimum system requirement, I can still run it on 30+ fps on high/epic combination settings. But I do hope my fps will improve as the game progress on.

I highly recommend this game if you like open world games + sneaking game. You'd enjoy this game for sure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056700704', 'num_games_owned': 1370, 'num_reviews': 594, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1496835347}
review:
謎の島からの脱出サバイバルゲー。
水分、体力、スタミナのパラメータがある。
ノーヒントの冒険感は好き。

犬が強すぎて笑えない。
今のところ倒す手段がなく、足も速いので見つかったらほぼ死亡な状況。

メインクエストを進めていたのですが、
マップに表示されたポイントに移動しても何も起こらず
詰んでしまったのでギブアップしました。

そんなオワタゲーだけど乗り越えたくなる謎の魅力がありました。
ただし人様にはお薦めしません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198077824245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 774, 'last_played': 1542731856}
review:
[h1] Умри молодым...умри упав в колодец...умри от крысы/собаки/змеи...умри	[/h1]

[i]Серьезно, слово Die в названии игры начинает оправдывать себя с первой минуты игры. [/i]

Итак, вышла в ЕА замечательная игра, в которую я влюбился с первого трейлера. Нетривиальная история о кучке мажоров, которые прожигают жизнь и родительские денежки, и в конечном итоге, однажды, жажда приключений заводит их в полную ж...

Приведу стандартные для обзоров "+/-", дабы вы смогли для себя понять, нужна ли вам в коллекции эта игра или стоит пройти мимо(не проходите). Обзор актуален для версии игры от 04.08.2017. Вышло крупное обновление. Новая территория с похотливым дедком и парочкой злобных волков. Помимо этого - несколько графических фиксов.Игра определенно растёт.

[h1] Плюсы [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Отменная графика и прекрасная оптимизация. За местные красоты отвечает UE 4, а значит даже владельцы бюджетного железа (на вроде моего i5 7400 и gforce 1050 ti 4gb, 8 gb ram) смогут запустить игру на "Эпике" в 40-60 фпс.    
    [*]Цена для региона в 350 руб. к 15$ в остальных уголках мира. Для современного рынка вполне дешево.
     [*] Геймплей с элементами всего и сразу - паркур в стиле Mirors Edge/Dyning Light. Беготня от врагов в стиле Outlast. Крафт и интерфейс от The Forest и других выживалок.
    [*] Внимание к мелочам. К примеру, до момента прочтения книги о ботанике, наша гг называет собираемые растения чисто от балды. Инвентарь фиксирован карманами, рюкзаками и поясами. Обувь одевается только парой. И ещё много всего.
[/list]

[h1] Минусы [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Местная фауна через чур агрессивна, а ИИ врага обладает просто неимоверной чуйкой на главную героиню. И если собакам это простительно, то  крысы и агрессивные гадюки вызывают какое-то недоумение. Не свойственно диким зверям так бросаться на людей. Волки на острове вообще самые отбитые звери. Преследуют долго и упорно. Убивают быстрее чем собаки.
    [*] Паркур конечно есть, но е-моё. Главная героиня может один раз уцепится за уступ, до которого ты и не думал долететь, а в следующий раз она промахнется мимо огромного камня.
    [*] Система сохранения прогресса через костры. Был бы это Dark Souls я бы промолчал. Но в этой игре, где система паркура, пока что, кривовата, это порой становится настоящим испытанием для нервной системы.Упав в 15 раз со скалы начинает таки бомбить.
[/list]

Как итог. Хорошая игра. Есть сюжет, есть графика, есть интересные задумки. Есть симпатичная героиня. За 350 рублей сейчас можно брать смело в коллекцию. Проект активно патчится. Уже сейчас очевидно, что это будет топовая игра.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050488087', 'num_games_owned': 1924, 'num_reviews': 220, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1496761504}
review:
PRIMERA IMPRESIÓN:
Para ser una alfa no está nada mal; el rendimiento es bueno, los gráficos están bastante bien, la isla es muy bonita, no he visto bugs, no hay cuelgues.
La exploración es interesante, trepar es divertido, la falta de agua es agobiante de momento, aunque eso lo hace también más emocionante, quizás más adelante encuentre agua en abundancia, cantimploras y esas cosas, ahora de momento toca aguantar con bayas y una cerveza que encontré (caliente, beeeej)
Ignoro si tiene mucho contenido, aunque los desarrolladores prometen añadir más cosas, quests, enemigos, etc , aún así dicen que hay unas 15 horas de contenido actualmente.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970317658', 'num_games_owned': 921, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1496712855}
review:
Jogo em Acesso antecipado de sobrevivência em mundo aberto, nada de novidade? ERRADO. Esse jogo me surpreendeu, em especial por estar em Alpha e rodando muito bem em uma AMD FX8200E, 970GTX, 12gb no máximo. O jogo tem um enredo bem interessante, que lembra um pouco Far Cry 3, com algo tipo massacre da serra elétrica. Mas o contraponto disso é o visual colorido e ensolarado da Ilha que temos para explorar. Não se engane, você está em perigo o tempo todo, com um brutamontes com uma foice andando pelo mapa e câes de guarda que podem te matar a qualquer momento. O jogo tem elementos de RPG com quests, nada muito elaborado ainda, mas que te prende na jogatina. O mais legal sem dúvida é a jogabilidade, em primeira pessoa, vc controla uma mulher habilidosa no Parkour, ela se pendura em tudo no melho estilo Mirror's Edge, e é bem feito, jogo com UE4 com visuais bonitos e jogabilidade fluída e agradável. E o preço é convidativo, pois deve aumentar quando o jogo estiver pronto. AH...e a trilha sonora é muito boa, em especial da tela principal, adorei o som.

Logo postarei um vídeo testando o jogo.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okIt4Ja6wj4

author: {'steamid': '76561198052526729', 'num_games_owned': 1202, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1568690756}

review: 被题材所吸引，虽然是EA状态，但是游戏内容已经非常丰富了，自由度和各种小细节导致玩家会慢慢思考游戏的流程应该如何如何，循序渐进一环扣一环的情节推进非常有趣。游戏前期有点生存游戏的意思，中期就变成了第一称的古墓丽影的感觉，对的，是初代古墓丽影的感觉，非常硬核的跳跃难度和致命的野生动物。强烈推荐这款游戏，不定期更新感想。

author: {'steamid': '76561198160973696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1501423372}
review:
友人達と島で遊び、夏を楽しむはずだった...
しかし、目が覚めると そこは光が閉ざされた深い穴の底。
天井が開き、一枚の地図が放り込まれ、それを頼りに島からの脱出を試みる。

茂みに潜む毒蛇、放たれた猛犬、徘徊する謎の大男、放置された惨殺死体、そして数々の謎...

そんな魅力的な島で展開されるサバイバルアドベンチャー。

粗削りな部分は残ってますが、
パルクールでの探索、体力・渇きを保つための素材調達、クラフト要素、アドベンチャーなどの
バランスが程よくミックスされてます。
そして、この価格でこのクオリティーは凄いと率直に思う。

今後の発展もかなり期待出来るお薦めなゲーム。

author: {'steamid': '76561198051312861', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 479, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1516987936}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011875318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1583161433}
review:
The best way i can sum up this game; imagine a survival game, but instead of your goal just being to survive endlessly, there is actually a story to follow, however it isn't one of those stories where you're forced to pursue a linear path, you just wake up, and off you go. You discover things through exploration and slowly piece together the mysteries, i particularly like how you can't just craft everything right away, but you have to educate your protagonist by finding information on the island.

This game is as much a mystery adventure game as it is a survival game.

Also, it seems they understand that having to monitor your hydration is not something people want to be bothered with every twenty seconds like on other survival games, and that is much appreciated, and it allows you to really enjoy the world more.

I notice some people in other reviews complaining that the enemies never stop chasing.. And this is true for those that you can't outrun; but i feel that simply comes from a lack of understanding on how the game works, you can still escape them even if they can chase you, via climbing, or standing on something they cannot access..Something i feel people fail to understand is that the game is a stealth game also, you're supposed to hide in the bushes, not run around in the open like i myself did my first time playing.

You want a game where you can run around without concern, this isn't the game for you..There is potential danger around every corner.

So far no bugs, and it carries what it tries to do seamlessly as far as i can tell. For early access, you can't go wrong, i highly recommend.

And if i had to pick a criticism, i'd say perhaps some of the animations could be smoother, and it could probably do with less snakes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049614144', 'num_games_owned': 1439, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1496823754}

author: {'steamid': '76561198142433450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1497066731}
review:
As it stands, this game does not know what it really wants to be.  It was such a let down for me as I had very high hopes for it and was really looking forward to getting my hands on it.  The exploration and Parkour elements are incredible and make the game tolerable.  The enemies and Horrendous graphics(and they are terrible) make this game nearly unplayable.  A game like this needs to be between 50 and 60 FPS at all times and even on a high tier gaming PC I only could achieve between 28(yes you read that correctly) and sometimes during very short stints I could get 60 FPS.  Overall just bad.

The game has an incredibly unbalanced and poor save system and lacks fast travel and quick save.  The inclusion of even one of these would make this game much more fun.  Flashy Trailers and Intense "gameplay" videos with "cool" music cannot mask how poor this game is.

Overall Rating 3\10 and I cannot recommend it.  I cannot figure out how every review for this game is positive.  Give the developer something to work on because there is a lot of things that need to be fixed in this game.

The enemies never stop chasing you...EVER!

Also, if you like dying from Rats biting at your feet and want a "wimp on an Island" simulator, then this game is absolutely for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064434403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 445, 'last_played': 1515916024}
review:
After seeing footage of alpha gameplay on youtube, I thought Die Young looked rather interesting. Little did I know atfer looking it up on Steam over the weekend to follow the news that it would be hitting early access in only a few days. NEAT.

So far I have enjoyed myself. Havent experienced any major bugs outside of falling off a minor hill and being obliterated back to my savepoint. Literally fell off a building before and took damage but oookay GG.

Die Young seems to have heavily taken from Dying Light, as in certain parkour actions looks damn near identical. Granted I dont know how varied you can get with vaulting over things and such. I do like the climbing actions alot though, in addition to a persistent stamina system while climbing things it actually seems realistic.
Also, and I will freely admit I am no expert with the series, but I swear it also takes something from Metal Gear. Whenever you get detected by an enemy capable of doing real damage, theres a retro sounding blip noise. I just thought that was funny.

As of now, I have only explored the Twin Houses, the Manor, and some of the Temple since if it isnt the sycthe wielding d-bag hunting me down its a bane of my existence dog chasing me to the ends of the earth trying to chomp my booty. I like it enough. Die Young, not the dog. F*ck dogs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080428702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1549700869}
review:
เป็นเกมส์จากค่ายที่ไม่ค่อยรู้จักเท่าไหร่ เเต่ก็ทำเกมส์ออกมาได้ค่อนข้างดีพอสมควร เนื้อหาของเกมส์ก็ประมาณว่าเราเป็นสาวไฮโซมาเที่ยวเกาะ เเต่ว่าดันมาเจอเหตการณ์วุ่นวาย จนเเทบจะเอาตัวไม่รอด เพื่อนฝูงกระจัดกระจายไปคนละที่ ตัวเกมส์เป็นเเนวเอาชีวิตรอดที่ให้ความรู้สึกตื่นเต้นได้ดีมาก ระบบบางส่วนมีความเหมือน dying light เเต่เกมส์นี้เน้นหนีมากกว่าสู้ เเละมีความยากที่สูงกว่า ค่อนข้างท้าทายดี เเต่ปัจจุบันยังมีบัค เเละระบบการปืนป่ายที่ต้องเเก้ไข เพราะบางจุดที่ไม่ใช่ตัวเกมส์กำหนดไว้ พื้นที่ต่ำกลับปืนขึ้นไม่ได้ เเละภาพกราฟฟิคที่ยังสวยเเบบไม่เต็มที่ ณ ตอนที่ผมรีวิวนี้เกมส์ยังไม่ว่างจำหน่าย เเต่คาดว่าเกมส์นี้จะมีราคาที่ไม่สูงเกินไปจึงค่อนข้างคุ้มที่จะซื้อมาลองเล่นกันดูครับ ใครอยากดูวิดิโอตัวสินใจก่อนซื้อก็สามารถรับชมได้ที่ช่องผมได้เลยครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198053321412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1496888626}
review:
Be prepared to die. Constantly. For the dumbest garbage. While your character is equipped with tools, they don't really count as weapons- unless you're fighting the snakes and rats. Dogs will kill you 98% of the time, and they appear out of no where. No amount of surveilence will help with this; you could sit in a spot to watch the patrolling humans and dogs, but back up a little to avoid them, and the dogs will come to kill you. 

Hope you found your save spots, because you will need them, and you'll be replaying portions of the game over and over and over and over.......

author: {'steamid': '76561198019474969', 'num_games_owned': 1078, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1497142955}
review:
[h1]Endlich mal was neues! [/h1]

[h1]Kurze Einleitung:[/h1]
Mittlerweile bin ich wirklich Müde die ständigen Early Access- Survival/Crafting auf Steam mir anzusehen. 
Kaum eines wird es überhaupt jemals aus Early Access schaffen und andere werden als frühe Beta Versionen als "vollständig fertiges" Spiel verkauft.

Ich hoffe das dieses Schicksal diesem Spiel verschont bleibt. Denn es setzt sich in vielen Punkten von den üblichen 08/15 Survival spielen schön ab. Nichts  mit stundenlangem Crafting, stundenlangem Sammeln, stundenlangem Häuserbau und stundenlangem Resourcenmangament. Hier steht nur die Entdeckung im Vordergrund, was mir verdammt gut gefällt.


Man schlüpft in die Rolle von Daphne einer jungen Erwachsenen und äußerst sportlich sowie Reich erscheinenden Dame die mit ihren reichen und hippen Kollegen ala FarCry 3 ein abenteuer erleben will. Naja doch wie so üblich in solchen Spielen geht etwas schief und man wacht benebelt in einem ausgetrockneten Brunnen. Auf der suche nach Hinweisen und einen weg von der Gottverdammten Insel zu entkommen. Gut das uns der Entführer so nett war und eine Handgemalte Karte zu hinterlassen. Möchte diese Person etwa ein Spiel mit uns spielen ?

Mit durchlöcherten Hotpants und einem dreckigen T-Shirt bewaffnet entdecken wir viele, im ersten Eindruck, verlassene Orte/Gebäude und Höhlen.  Das macht besonders viel Spaß, da das Pakour System sich sehr gut anfühlt. Auch wenn hier die Kamera leider ab und an noch einige schwächen hat. Manchmal steckt diese in den Wänden des Gebäudes drin oder lässt sich manchmal nicht weiter bewegen. Ist mir bis jetzt aber zum Glück nur ein Mal passiert. Wollte es dennoch erwähnen.
Beim Klettern ist aber städig auf die Ausdauer von Daphne zu achten, denn ist man gerade auf dem Weg eine steile Wand zu erklimmen und legt keine Atempause ein so kann es passieren das man kurz vorm Ende 20 Meter tief fällt und an mehreren Brüchen stirbt. Hierbei ist besonders frustrierend wenn man, das letzte mal vor 30 Minuten gespeichert hat. 
Speichern kann man an kleinen Lagerfeuern die man an diveren PoI (Points of Interests) sowie manchmal in der Spielwelt verteilt findet. (Erinnert etwas an Dark Souls, nur das die Gegner nicht neu spawnen.) 

[h1]Durstlöscher[/h1]
Ebenfalls muss man stätig seine "Durst-Leiste" im Blick behalten um in der Hitze nicht als trockener Ast zuenden. Trinken kann man durch kleinere Brunnen die ebenfalls an diversen PoIs zu finden sind, durch Beeren die man pflückt, versteckte Wasserquellen oder aus seinem gefundenen Trinken bzw. der Trinkflasche. Auf Essen muss man hier zum glück nicht achten. Dies würde den Entdeckungsfokus des Spiels berauben. Es ist zum glück auch nicht nötig alle 10 minuten zu Trinken.

[h1]Zerfleischt, verdurstet oder knochen Bruch- der Tod ist überall[/h1]
Auf der Insel wartet aber nicht nur der Tod durch herabfallen oder stolpern sondern es gibt auch einige Tiere wie wilde Hunde, Ratten, giftige Schlagen und andere Wesen die das Überleben nicht leichter gestalten. Ratten sowie Schlangen stellen die geringste gefahr, wobei die Hunde einem in Hundeseile den Tod bringen können, wenn man Ihnen nicht mehr entkommt. Es ist auch möglich die Hunde zu besiegen diese haben allerdings deutlich mehr Leben als das Kleintier. Und sollte euch so ein Hund erwischen ist Daphne nicht sofort Tod sondern kann in einem QTE den Köter für kurze Zeit wegtreten bevor er einem den Arm abbeißt.

[h1]Quests[/h1]
Es gibt viele Arten von Quetst die ihr erfüllen könnt aber nicht müsst. Die einzige die ihr eingntlich nur braucht ist die Hauptquest in der ihr von der Insel entkommen müsste. Alles andere ist soweit frei und euch überlassen. Hol und Bring Quests wie in WoW oder anderen MMOs gibt es zum glück nicht. Hier ist wie gesagt der wichtigere Aspekt die Entdeckung von Ruinen/Gebäuden und co. Somit beziehen sich die meisten Quest auf die Erforschung/Entdeckung.


[h1]Echtzeit,Ruhe und Schnellreise[/h1]
Nicht wie in den meisten Survival Games, wechselt die Tageszeit nicht alle 10-15 Minuten sonder läuft in Echtzeit ab. Eine Minute im Spiel = eine Minute im echten Leben. Die Zeit passt sich nicht der echten Uhrzeit an, sondern läuft nur während des spielens weiter. 
Da die Insel zum Anfgang sehr groß ist, gibt es auch die Möglichkeit ohne lange Laufwege an bestimmten Punkten das Tunnelsystem zu verwenden um schnell von einem Punkt zum nächsten zu kommen. Dabei vergehen ca 30-60 min. ingame Zeit. Sehr löblich das so ein System schon in der Alpha enthalten ist.
Sollte es aber doch nach einigen Stunden dunkel werden habt ihr die Möglichkeit auch zu rasten. Das passiert aber nicht wie so oft in eurem selbst gebauten Heim, sondern auch im Tunnelsystem neben dem ihr wie auch beschrieben schnellreisen könnt.


[h1]Basic-Crafting und anderes Sammelzeugs[/h1]
Wer die Grundlagen soweit erstmal verstanden hat findet auch verstreut viele Dinge zum einsammeln wie Notizen und andere wichtigen Dinge. Denn auch ein Basic-Craftingsystem gibt es in diesem Spiel. Zum Glück ist das Pflanzensammeln nicht so nervig wie in FarCry 3, wo ich alle 2 1/2 bis 3 Meter von 4 neuen Pflanzen abgelenkt wurde. Verdammt sein meine innere Pflanzenoma. Zum Craften gibt es einige Waffen wie Rohrzange oder Brecheisen oder auch Heilungskraut. Zum aktuellen Zeitpunkt habe ich noch nicht viel mehr entdeckt, möchte aber auch nicht alles vorwegnehmen :)


[h1]Grafik&Performance[/h1]
Das Spiel läuft auf der Unreal Engine 4 und sieht sehr hübsch aus. Vorallem die Farbenfrohe Insel gefällt mir sehr.
An einigen Orten sieht man aber das trotz maximaler Grafikeinstellungen die Texturen doch sehr verwaschen wirken vorallem bei  einige Modells.
Auf meiner schon 4 Jahre alten Kiste läuft das Spiel sehr gut. Trotz eines AMD FX 6300 @ 4,3 Ghz und einer R9270x mit 2GB VRAM kann ich alles auf anschlag stellen,bis auf Schatten und AA. Es läuft bei mir fast durchgehend mit 60 FPS, ab und an vorallem in Gebieten mit mehr Objekten komme ich dann auf noch angenehme 45 FPS. 

[h1]Abkürzungen[/h1]
[spoiler] 
Sobald man eine Ruine erkundet hat, kann man am ende meist ein Schlüssel finden. Mit dem man einige Türen öffnen kann,um so schneller an eine Wasserquelle oder an noch liegen gelassene Pfanzen& co.zu gelangen.[/spoiler] 

[h1]Inventar und Ausrüstung[/h1]
Verdammt maximale Wörter erreicht:c Begrenzt -> Aufrüstbar 

[h1]Wichtig: Immersion[/h1]
Was mich ebenfalls sehr gefreut hat, ist das man (oder Frau) in der Lage ist seinen virtuellen Körper zu sehen. Dies gibt vorallem beim Klettern mehr feeling!

Ich finde es nämlich sehr schade das dies in vielen Spielen vorallem auch in RPG wie Fallout/Skyrim nicht beachtet wird und man ledeglich einen schwebenden Oberköper "sieht". Dies gibt mir noch mehr die Lage mich in die Person hineinzuversetzen.  


[h1]Fazit-Ersteindruck:[/h1]
Die Insel auf der man Landet ist vom aussehen sehr hübsch und bietet einiges zu entdecken, da ich gerade erst nur eine Stunde spielen konnte kann ich noch nicht viel mehr sagen. Wenn es euch gefällt haltet aufjedenfall ein Auge drauf und unterstützt den Entwickler. 
Ich würde mich sehr freuen, wenn sich das Spiel durch eure hilfe weiter entwickelt.
Hier ist noch eine menge menge Potential und ich freue mich tierisch auf weitere Neuerungen und Updates die alle 2-4 Wochen erscheinen werden.
Vorallem für den Preis gibt es nichts zu meckern. Bitte beachtet das es nur eine Alpha ist und dafür schon wirklich sehr fortgeschritten!

Nun aber .....

Vielen Dank fürs lesen meines "kurzen" Berichts zu meinem Ersteindruck.
Wenn es euch gefallen hat würde ich mich über eine Bewertung freuen, und bei Fragen oder Feedback lasst gern einen Kommentar da. Bei weiteren Erkenntnissen werde ich die "Review" bearbeiten.

In dem Sinne einen schönen Tag oder Abend noch :)

[h1]Edit[/h1]
- Quests
- Echtzeituhr, Ruhe und Schnellreise
- Performance
- Abkürzungen
- Inventar und Ausrüstung

author: {'steamid': '76561197993537005', 'num_games_owned': 916, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1496633468}
review:
[b][u]See written review below[/u][/b] or watch it here: https://youtu.be/2A9e86G9br0
[h1]TL;DR: SKIP TO CONCLUSION![/h1]

You play as a young woman who’s been kidnapped, and stranded on a dangerously beautiful island. You have no idea why you’re here, but you must find a way to survive, and escape. The story premise is interesting, and drove me to want to explore, and find more information. However, since the game is in early access, there’s no closure for the time-being, so I admit was a bit sad that the story isn’t finished yet.

Die Young’s gameplay focuses heavily on exploration, parkour, and survival. There are main quest objectives, but also several side missions become available as you explore the map. The open world allows you to freely explore the different landmarks around the map at your own pace. The exploration is great, and you find more information about the events that have taken place on the island and look for clues on how to escape.

The best part of the exploration is all the parkour that you get to do to reach some locations. I found the parkour very enjoyable. The motion and controls feel fluid, and the parts of the terrain you are able to grab onto are typically easy to notice because they usually have white paint on them. There were a few jumps that I encountered that were long distance jumps, and timing played a huge role in making successful jumps. Running and climbing uses stamina though, so you’ll have to be careful to not run out of stamina while climbing and fall to your death. 

There is no character progression system, but you can find items that give you bonuses, such as the running shoes that give you more stamina, or the backpack that gives you more inventory space. There aren’t a lot of items implemented yet, so it will be nice when more gear is available.

Aside from stamina, you’ll also need to monitor your health bar. Early on in the game, you will be defenseless, so you’ll want to avoid combat until you have the tools to fight back. Later on, you’ll find recipes to craft tools to be able to fight back. The tools all have durability though, so you’ll have to keep crafting new ones, which can be a bit annoying since they don’t seem to last very long. Even with a weapon though, you’re still pretty vulnerable, so just because you can fight, doesn’t mean you should. If you do happen to die, you’ll respawn at the last campfire location that you saved at. 

Thirst is another survival aspect you’ll need to manage. You’ll want to scavenge for food and find water sources to stay hydrated. Eating food restores some missing health, but hunger isn’t in the game yet. Thirst mechanics are pretty balanced, and easy to manage since food and water are plentiful.

Die Young also has a crafting system that unlocks new recipes as you explore and find them. Crafting is done through the crafting menu by combining various resources you’ve scavenged. The crafting system is easy to use and understand, and you can make items like tools, health kits, and a knife. There is a limited number of each resource you can carry, and your item inventory space is limited as well.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list][*]very enjoyable parkour with good motion, and fluid controls
[*]exploration is rewarding, and you can find clues or items to help you survive and escape
[*]survival aspects (stamina, thirst, health) are pretty balanced, and easy to manage since food, water, and resources are plentiful (hunger isn’t in the game yet)
[*]good, intuitive crafting system, with an abundance of resources to find and craft with as you explore
[*]there are some fast travel locations to quickly travel that help cut down on the travel time and backtracking once you unlock them
[*]appealing graphics with nice environments
[*]sound effects and music are fine - it’s nice to have the audio cues when you aggro something
[*]keyboard and mouse controls are fully customizable, and there is full controller support[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list][*]inconsistent fall damage; sometimes sliding down a small hill that’s not even that steep can damage or even kill you, but then other times you fall from further and you are just fine
[*](nitpick) weapon durability is low, and having to make more can be a pain
[*](nitpick) some texture popping issues
[*](nitpick) enemy models and their animations aren’t the greatest; they could use more detail, but they’re not terrible either
[*](nitpick) while you can have more than one game, there is only one save slot per game that keeps the most recent save; more saves kept for the same game would be nice
[*](nitpick) performance could use some improvements, but it's still tolerable (frame drops into the low-mid 50s fairly frequently with above the recommended specs)[/list]

I’ve played the game for over 5 hours so far. The gameplay is enjoyable, but I don’t expect there to be much in the way of replay value once you find and complete everything.

[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]
Die Young is off to a great start. The exploration is good, and parkour is fun. I’m eager to see more content added, especially the main story. If you’re looking to get in at the ground level, and explore and parkour all over the place, then you’ll likely enjoy Die Young in its current early access state. If you’re interested in experiencing a fully fleshed out story experience, then you might want to wait for everything to be fully implemented down the road.

If you like my reviews, please feel free to join my Steam group, and follow my curations [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/AzralynnReviews#curation]here.[/url]
You can also view this review on my website [url=http://www.azralynn.com/review-die-young-early-access-game/]here.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198009162597', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1672873111}
review:
I really like the basic concept of this game, open world, go at your own pace, great graphics, loaded with options for video, controller, keyboard etc. Lots of places to go and things to do and watch for. Basically a relaxing game untill he spots you, or the dogs, snakes and whatever else is there. Challenging at times, but not impossibly hard, good sound track and environmental sounds. Explore, hide, crouch, craft, find food and water and save points.
I personally like this game alot and recommend to anyone seeking something different. Be aware though, to run in extreme, maxed out mode will require somewhat of a hefty system.
I am maxed out 3440x1440 on a 34" curved Dell monitor with only a EVGA GTX 980ti s/c (no overclocking at all), and an I7 9730x cpu with liquid cooling and the temps do reach the 40C mark.
The Unreal engine 4 really makes fo gorgeous graphics. App 2hours+ into game and so far no bugs. No idea what my fps is but runs smoooth. Reminds me of hide and seek in a way. Really gets the adrenaline pumping when you are spotted and chased. A very well made game with plenty to look forward to between now and completion.
Thank you devs-keep on with the updates and patches.

Не хочу тут разглагольствовать, но эта та покупка ранего доступа за последние года о которой я не жалею! Надеюсь будет поддерживаться и дорабатываться и думаю из этого выйдет классный сюрвайвал. 
2 женской груди (если опустить камеру вниз) из 2!

author: {'steamid': '76561198313461738', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1526684065}
review:
Настал релиз и игра снова потеряла русский язык.


Обзор раннего доступа (Много букв. Разработчики говорят о том, что игра проходит стадию балансировки)

 Мир полный врагов и опасностей. Действия игры разворачиваются на острове Средиземного моря, недалеко от Турции. Компания ребят решает отдохнуть, но происходит что-то неожиданное и главная героиня оказывается в огромном колодце. Экшен от первого лица с женщиной-протагонистом. Ассоциации с Ларой Крофт надо гнать прочь, наша героиня в данной версии игры не может хладнокровно разделываться с врагами, зато прыгает она очень хорошо. Нужно иметь необходимое оружие что бы уничтожить противников. QTE сцены сражения по мне довольно сложные, может со временем их сделают проще. Нельзя выбрать уровень сложности для прохождения игры.
   Страх высоты, змей, собак, а также злодеев гоняющих вас по локации. Лишь стоит на секунды расслабиться и дать себя обнаружить. Все это вместе с хорошим звуковым сопровождением и живой озвучкой, делают погружение в мир острова  относительно реалистичным. Для многих минусом окажется отсутствие русской локализации.
  12 квадратных километров острова и около 10 часов основного сюжета ждут своих героев. Будьте готовы к тому, что сохраняться можно лишь в определенных местах, так же не получиться иметь несколько различных сохранений. Персонаж не имеет уровней, а его улучшения зависят лишь от одежды и оборудования.
   Оптимизация игры не очень проработана на максималках (i5  - 4590 / 1050 Ti – 4 Гб / 8 Гб ОЗУ)  в разрешении 1920 * 1080 выдает всего лишь около 45 фпс. Картинка несколько замыленная. Нет переключения на вид от третьего лица.
   Прогулка по острову в поисках спасения не будет легкой, особенно в самом начале.
   9 смертей из 10

  Хочется верить, что ребята нас порадуют, а не забросят игру. Для ру региона цена 314 рублей вместо 15$ (со временем цена изменится).

review:
Avis Open Aplha
Trés bon jeu, trés bonne bande sonore! La jouabilité est excellente, montrant un réalisme dans les éxécutions des mouvements! Jeu très prometteur, qui je l'espère après la version Alpha mérite d'être connu! Avec un tel jeu, j'espère que des voix françaises ou du moins une traduction française soit implémenter plus tard dans les sous-titres et les menus pour permettre à plus de joueurs venant de pays francophones comme la France ou la province de Québec de pouvoir connaître ce jeu et en apprécier son gameplay et pouvoir le recommander à plus de gens possible!

review: Grafisch und storymäßig ist das Spiel nett gemacht. Was mir bisher negativ aufgefallen ist: Wenn man stirbt startet man mit der HP und dem Durst des Zeitpunktes wo man gespeichert hat. Das heißt habt ihr Low-HP und speichert dürft ihr mit diesen Low-HP ewig weiter spielen (sofern ihr noch kein Medizin-Zeug craften könnt). Alles in allem würde ich das Spiel jedoch trotzdem empfehlen. Meinen ersten Eindruck findet ihr hier: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ju6elVaVefs

author: {'steamid': '76561197968097212', 'num_games_owned': 535, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1123, 'last_played': 1500624057}
review:
[h1]Disclaimer: This is a [u]Closed Alpha[/u] review, which is an even [i]earlier[/i] build than Early Access. I've tried to cover up all of my spoilers. If you don't want to get spoiled, simply skip the spoilers.

TL;DR: This is a good game. For $15, you can't really go wrong, and it gives you a decent bang for your buck.[/h1]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1]Opening Remarks[/h1]

This is a really nice gem of a game. I nabbed an Open Alpha key (which is now Closed Alpha) for only $10 USD at IndieGala's website back when they were promoting the game, which was about a month or two ago.

I've clocked over 15 hours on the game now (with maybe ~32 hours AFK at most), and I'm more or less near the end of the game (I've gone as far as I'm able to reach in the Alpha, which is Apricot Valley).

A lot has changed since I last played, which was on May 18th. You probably wouldn't like the game as much back then, because it lacked a [u]lot[/u] of content. And I mean [u][b]a lot[/b][/u]. There was basically nothing in the game [spoiler]except for [i]two[/i] different enemies which have simplistic AI and fixed paths.[/spoiler] (I'm not sure if that's been improved now, but I'll play on and see.)

At any rate, I started up the game with the expectation that it would be an Assassin's Creed-esque game with Dead Island/Dying Light elements, based on a gameplay video I watched of it. The truth wasn't far off from my expectations; the game was more or less a dumbed-down version of the two.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

One thing that the game absolutely surprised me with was the fear factor. This was not seen in the gameplay video I watched. Basically, right from the get-go, you're basically playing Amnesia: The Dark Descent.

The ambience of the game is really freaky, and for the longest time, you'll constantly be crouched down and abusing cover, moving very slowly. Over time, you'll feel even more creeped out, since it's a self-fulfilling prophecy. You might even have to take breaks because it really gets to you.

[spoiler]After you get past a few sections of the game, you'll start to lose the "Amnesia Factor", but hopefully the devs address that by adding more content later on in the game. Because the enemies and areas become predictable, you build up a tolerance and are no longer scared anymore. The issue has to do with logic: You're told that nowhere is safe so you believe it and play cautiously, but after a while you start to realize that nobody will actually come for you even if you just stay there forever.[/spoiler]

The game works on a health, hydration, and stamina system. You become dehydrated over time, so you constantly need to eat wild fruit or drink from spring water in order to keep yourself hydrated. Health is lost from primarily fall damage and getting hurt by enemies, but it's also possible to die of hydration. Stamina is used up through sprinting and parkour, but is recharged once you stop performing those actions.

It's really easy to die in the game from fall damage. Feel free to experiment, but be prepared to die a lot from simply falling. A lot of the drops are rather laughable because they're pretty low height, but you learn not to make those jumps after you die to them.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1]Environment & Story[/h1]

The map is absolutely gigantic. It's huge. And it's beautiful. (The Motion Blur is too strong though, so I suggest turning it off.)

At the moment, there's a ton of empty fields [spoiler]and not many hazards[/spoiler] because of the lack of content, but I'm sure it'll be improved over time, which will ramp up the difficulty. Not a whole lot goes on in the game except for exploring.

You play as some woman who's stranded on an island that you're supposedly kidnapped to. There's a note system and a map and crafting system similar to Dead Island/Dying Light, and there's a lot of lore and story to read. It's quite interesting.

When I played, there was virtually no quests available except for the main one and one or two  [i]extremely[/i] minor side quests, (which don't really provide a significant improvement to your gameplay).

There's enough bonfires (save areas which resemble the ones in Dark Souls) for you to save your progress at reasonable checkpoints. There's only [u]one[/u] area where I would argue that an additional bonfire is necessary because of the long (and frustrating) travel process to complete it, but it's not that big of a deal. I've experienced enough long runs in Dark Souls already.

The map is somewhat linear in the sense that you're given a very wide, loose "path" to follow. It's a big map, but it's designed in a way that you don't really ever need to backtrack [spoiler]except for one main quest.[/spoiler] I'm sure this will be reworked with the inclusion of more quests and content to force you to have to backtrack or fully utilize their fast travel system though (yes, the game has one, but it's seldom used).

Most areas have multiple "paths" leading to it, so you can plan out how you want to reach it, whether it be to head straight for it or to try to go around to avoid enemies.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h1]Ending Remarks[/h1]

[b]I recommend this game.[/b] it's really nice. You'll love playing it for the first 5-10 hours. You'll constantly want to play on to see what happens next.

The game has a lot of glitches to discover (which is actually quite fun to do) because they haven't been completely patched out yet. (That's not the intended purpose of the game, obviously.)

There is a [i]ton[/i] of potential for the game because of the sheer size of the map and the inclusion of the stealth, quest and crafting systems, and I'm sure it'll be even more fun to play when more quests and enemies are added.

(I somewhat suggest buyingt after the game leaves Early Access due to the lack of content right now, but you certainly won't be disappointed by what's already in the game even if you choose to buy now.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198053422627', 'num_games_owned': 2391, 'num_reviews': 1237, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1490476452}
review:
I must say that I really expected this game to cost a minimum of $19.99 USD and as much as $29.99 USD, so to see this game launching at only $15 USD with initial 10% discount is surprising.

Wanna see my first impressions gameplay from back in March when I first experienced it?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tyF0EoEc058

The value on this game is REALLY HIGH people.  The game is a ton of fun, has great graphics, and is really well developed for an early access game.  

The game places you on an island where you have complete freedom to explore it as you desire, and you must survive long enough to figure out why and how you wound up there and escape.  I am VERY impressed with my early game play of this game and honestly, I think it's worth double what it costs here.  

High recommended, 
...My early score is a 9 out of 10.  
(I will update my review and score once I get a chance to put more time into this game)
